[\[145b.1\]]par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par
[\[145b.2\]]blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par smra ba [#]ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes de skad [#]ma zer cig[ #]/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan
[\[145b.3\]]pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/[ #]'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba [#]yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs
[\[145b.4\]]par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa [#]de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe[#] dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa
[\[145b.5\]]nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa yang [#]gsal bar byed na bde ba la
[\[145b.6\]]reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig[ #]/de ni dus dang por bya ba'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bzhams de bsgo yang gzhi [#]de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas
[\[145b.7\]]'di nyid bden gyi/[# ]gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na de dag [#]gsol ba dang bzhi'i [#]las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/[ #]dge slong ko ka li ka dang /_kha Na Da
[\[146a.2\]]drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti [#]mo ra ka ti sh+ya [#]dang /_rgya mtshos byin 'di dag 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul [#]bar bgyid cing /_dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis pa de'i grogs bgyid cing mi mthun
[\[146a.3\]]par smra nas 'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo na/_'di dag la dge 'dun rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyi na/_gal te dge 'dun
[\[146a.4\]]gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ko ka li ka dang /_kha Na Da drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti [#]mo ra ka ti sh+ya [#]dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa [#]dbye ba'i rtul [#]bar byed
[\[146a.5\]]cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi [#]mthun pa smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig_/
[\[146a.6\]]de[#] ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par smra ba [#]ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong
[\[146a.7\]]'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma
[\[146b.2\]]byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig_/
[\[146b.3\]]'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig du 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig [#]ces gsol ba dang
[\[146b.4\]]bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad do/_/'di[#] ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti [#]mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /[ #]rgya mtshos byin 'di dag 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa
[\[146b.5\]]dbye ba'i slad du rtul [#]bar bgyid cing dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis pa de'i grogs bgyid cing mi mthun par smra nas 'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo na/_'di dag la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams [#]te bsgo yang
[\[146b.6\]]gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti [#]mo ra ka ti sh+ya [#]dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la tshe dang ldan
[\[146b.7\]]pa dag khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul [#]bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa de'i grogs byed cing mi mthun par smra ba'i rjes su phyogs par ma byed cig_/dge slong rnams la 'di
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig[ #]/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba/_'dul ba smra [#]ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas
[\[147a.2\]]rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes pa ni [#]ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes ma zer cig[ #]/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di
[\[147a.3\]]ni chos smra ba ma yin/_'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa smra ba/_'dul ba ma yin pa smra ba/_dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/_dge slong 'di ni
[\[147a.4\]]mi shes bzhin du smra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod cing bzod par ma byed cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun mthun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis
[\[147a.5\]]shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga' mi rtsod/_mchog gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur
[\[147a.6\]]gyi/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjes su phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig [#]ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti mo [#]ra ka ti sh+ya [#]dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i
[\[147a.7\]]las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig[ #]/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis ko ka li ka dang /_khaN Da drab [#]bya dang /_ka ti mo
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ra[#] ka ti sh+ya [#]dang /_rgya mtshos byin rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs pa la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/khyim sun 'byin pa'i dge 'dun
[\[147b.2\]]lhag ma'i skabs nas khyim sun 'byin [#]pa la bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong rab tu [#]mang po dag grong ngam grong rdal zhig na nye bar brten [#]cing gnas par gyur la/_de dag kyang khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par gyur cing /_de dag
[\[147b.3\]]gis khyim dag sun phyung bar mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes sam/_de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod par mthong ngam/_thos sam/_rab tu shes na dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te/_
[\[147b.4\]]khyed kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang [#]mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed 'di na [#]gnas pas chog gi [#]gnas 'di nas deng shig [#]ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/gal te de dag dge slong rnams la 'di
[\[147b.5\]]skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis [#]'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes zer na/_dge slong
[\[147b.6\]]de dag la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan [#]gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par
[\[147b.7\]]shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig[ #]/dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gti[#] mug gis 'gro ba/[ #]'jigs pas [#]'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig[ #]/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_
[\[148a.2\]]zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa bdag [#]nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim dag sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed
[\[148a.3\]]sdig pa kun tu spyod par yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi [#]lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis [#]'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig[ #]/de ni dus dang
[\[148a.4\]]por bya ba'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na/_de dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar
[\[148a.5\]]bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces
[\[148a.6\]]brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab [#]so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyis par 'tshal bzhin du/_de dag la
[\[148a.7\]]'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing /_dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]pas 'gro ba [#]dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na [#]las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes mchi nas/[ #]'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis [#]mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni
[\[148b.2\]]brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab [#]so gnyis la tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang
[\[148b.3\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig[ #]/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig[ #]/dge slong rnams la
[\[148b.4\]]yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba [#]dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/
[\[148b.5\]]de[#] ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/[ #]'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid kyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim
[\[148b.6\]]sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod pa yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi [#]lam dang /_zhe sdang gis [#]'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig
[\[148b.7\]]gi [#]lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig [#]ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba [#]mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so 'di gnyis dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gnas brtan gnas
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]brtan gang dag re lde ri la mchis nas 'di gnyis bskrad pa'i las bgyis par 'tshal bzhin du/_de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes mchi/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes mchi zhing dge slong rnams la yang 'di
[\[149a.2\]]skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba dag yin te/_'di ltar [#]ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes mchi nas/_
[\[149a.3\]]'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di gnyis la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du [#]dge 'dun
[\[149a.4\]]gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis la/_tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis khyed dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag re lde ri la dong nas khyed bskrad pa'i las byas par shes bzhin du de dag la 'dun pas 'gro ba zhes ma
[\[149a.5\]]zer cig_/zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes ma zer cig_/dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong kha cig 'dun pas 'gro ba/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro
[\[149a.6\]]ba dag yin te/_'di ltar ltung ba 'dra ba kho na las dge slong kha cig ni skrod par byed/_kha cig ni skrod par mi byed do zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de dag ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin/_gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin/_'jigs pas
[\[149a.7\]]'gro ba ma yin/[ #]'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dag nyid khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dag yin te/_khyed nyid kyis khyim sun phyung bar yang mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes/_khyed sdig pa kun tu spyod par mthong zhing thos la rab tu shes pa'i phyir/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dun pas
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba/_gti mug gis 'gro ba/_'jigs pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so gnyis la
[\[149b.2\]]gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong
[\[149b.3\]]'gro[#] mgyogs dang nab [#]so gnyis la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni khyim sun 'byin pa las bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/bka' blo mi bde ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i skabs nas
[\[149b.4\]]bka' blo mi bde ba las [#]bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_'di na [#]dge slong 'ga' zhig bka' blo mi bde ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur la/_de la dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs
[\[149b.5\]]pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung ba dag la ci yang ma smra shig_/bdag kyang dge yang rung sdig kyang rung tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci yang mi smra'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag la tshig gi [#]lam
[\[149b.6\]]thong [#]shig_/khyed la yang bdag gis smras pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed na dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa
[\[149b.7\]]bslab[#] pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pas bdag nyid brjod par bya ba kho nar gyis shig_/dge slong rnams tshe dang
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]ldan pa la chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba na/_tshe dang ldan pa yang dge slong rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smros [#]shig_/'di lta ste gcig la gcig brjod par bya ba nyid du byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig
[\[150a.2\]]'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba 'di lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'di 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod bdag nyid brjod par bya
[\[150a.3\]]ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong [#]shig_/de ni dus dang por bya ba'o/_/de la dge slong rnams kyis bzhams te bsgo ba na gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na/_
[\[150a.4\]]de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_dge slong gcig
[\[150a.5\]]gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid nas/_'di la dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa bslab
[\[150a.6\]]pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang [#]'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na [#]tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung ba dag la ci yang ma smra shig_/bdag kyang dge yang rung sdig kyang rung tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]la ci
[\[150a.7\]]yang mi smra'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag la tshig gi lam 'di thong shig_/khyed la yang bdag gis smras pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag nyid brjod par bgyi ba ma lags par bgyid nas/_'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/[ #]'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu gzung [#]zhing mngon par zhen nas/_'di nyid bden gyi [#]gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun
[\[150b.2\]]pa la [#]tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa khyod dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par ma byed par tshe dang ldan pa
[\[150b.3\]]bdag nyid brjod par bya ba kho nar gyis shig_/dge slong rnams tshe dang ldan pa la chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba na/_tshe dang ldan pa yang dge slong rnams la [#]chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smros shig_/'di lta ste gcig la gcig brjod par bya ba nyid
[\[150b.4\]]du byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba nyid de lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor [#]'di 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa
[\[150b.5\]]khyod bdag nyid brjod [#]par bya ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung ba
[\[150b.6\]]chos bzhin du slar mi [#]bgyid nas 'di la dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa bslab [#]pa'i gzhi rnams dang bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang [#]mthun par smras pa na/[ #]tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang [#]rung bdag la
[\[150b.7\]]ci yang ma smra shig_/bdag kyang dge yang rung sdig kyang rung tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci yang mi smra'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag la tshig gi lam thong shig_/khyod la yang bdag gis smras pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag nyid brjod par bgyi ba ma lags par bgyid nas/_'di la dge slong
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas/_'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
[\[151a.2\]]dge[#] slong 'dun pa la tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa [#]khyod dge slong rnams kyis gdon par gtogs pa bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i mdor gtogs pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smras pa na/_bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par
[\[151a.3\]]ma byed par tshe dang ldan pas bdag nyid brjod par bya ba kho nar gyis shig_/dge slong rnams tshe dang ldan pa la chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smra ba na/_tshe dang ldan pa yang dge slong rnams la chos dang mthun pa dang 'dul ba dang mthun par smros shig_/'di lta ste gcig la
[\[151a.4\]]gcig brjod par bya ba nyid du byed pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'doms shig rjes su [#]ston pa dang /_gcig gis gcig ltung ba las slong ba nyid de [#]de lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'di 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_
[\[151a.5\]]tshe[#] dang ldan pa 'dun pa [#]khyod bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
[\[151a.6\]]gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni [#]gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te/_'di ltar
[\[151a.7\]]cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni bka' blo mi bde ba las bzlog [#]pa'i phyir bsgo [#]ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/'bral ba'i spang ba'i skabs nas dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rol tu 'bral bar byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong rgan po rgas pa 'khog [#]tu gyur pa dang nad pa yin la/_de'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar mi nus na dge 'dun gyis de la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang
[\[151b.2\]]ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dris ba'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan rims
[\[151b.3\]]bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa 'khog tu gyur pa'am/_bdag dge
[\[151b.4\]]slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can lags la/_bdag gi [#]snam sbyar 'di [#]lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_bdag dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa 'khog [#]tu gyur pa'am/_bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_
[\[151b.5\]]thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa 'khog tu gyur pa'am/_bdag dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i [#]gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du
[\[151b.6\]]bzlas/_de ni snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba [#]gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'od srungs 'di rgan
[\[151b.7\]]po sgas pa 'khog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di rlung nad can lags la/_'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa dgog [#]tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shAri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang
[\[152a.2\]]'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'od srungs 'di rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shAri'i bu 'di rlung nad can lags la/_'di'i snam
[\[152a.3\]]sbyar 'di [#]lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo ma thog [#]nas/_dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA' ri'i bu rlung nad can 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar gnang ba gsol te/[ #]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srung rgan po rgas
[\[152a.4\]]pa dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i
[\[152a.5\]]gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis [#]bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'od srungs rgan po rgas pas dgog tu gyur pa'am/_dge slong shA ri'i bu rlung nad can la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar
[\[152a.6\]]mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de [#]de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni rgan po'am nad pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/lo drug tu 'chang ba'i spang pa'i skabs nas dge slong gis [#]stan sar pa byed na mi 'dod
[\[152a.7\]]bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang stan sar pa [#]gzhan byed na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang pa'i [#]ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa de la/_dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ni dge slong lag gi
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bla gang la lo drug du stan gyis mi thub pa'i dge slong des dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol ba de la dge 'dun gyis lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong lag gi bla gang la lo drug tu stan gyis mi thub ba'i dge slong des dge 'dun las lo
[\[152b.2\]]drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol bar bya'o/_/'di ltar gsol bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa [#]byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong lag gi bla des bla
[\[152b.3\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims la phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lo drug tu bstan mi bgyid pa
[\[152b.4\]]las/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gyis[#] gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba stsal du
[\[152b.5\]]gsol/[ #]de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de ni lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol ba'o/_/de dge slong de dag gis dge slong lag gi bla de la dad pa'am yid ches pas 'gro ba [#]mi bya bar dge 'dun de thams cad 'dong bar bya ba'am/_dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i
[\[152b.6\]]dge slong dag gtang bar bya zhing de dag gis stan de rang gi mig sngar bab par bya ba'am/_yang na stan de dge 'dun gyi dbus su dbyung bar [#]bya ste/_gal te stan de ha cang ring ba yin na de de dag gis gcad [#]par bya'o/_/gal te ha cang thung ba yin na bal sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ha cang yangs
[\[152b.7\]]pa yin na de dag gis gcad [#]par bya'o/_/gal te ha cang dog pa yin na bal sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ral ba dang rdol ba yin na bal sbyin par bya'o/_/de ni dus dang por bya ba'o/[ #]/gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du bug rdol dang sha zad pa dang bcos dka' ba nyid yin na/_de'i 'og tu dge slong
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces [#]brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa las dge slong lag gi bla ming
[\[153a.2\]]'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol
[\[153a.3\]]to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la [#]lo drug tu stan mi bgyid pa la/[ #]dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba
[\[153a.4\]]gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang
[\[153a.5\]]dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lo drug tshun chad du stan [#]gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni dge slong lag gi bla stan med pa la lo drug tshun chad
[\[153a.6\]]du [#]stan gyi gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gser dngul la reg pa'i spang pa'i skabs nas yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len nam len du 'jug na spang pa'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa de la/_'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma bram ze khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang
[\[153a.7\]]gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyis/_ngas nyan thos rnams la rung bar bya ba cung zad gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan [#]te bcang bar bya'o/_/gzhan
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]yang dge slong gi [#]zhal ta byed pa spro bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong gis blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong gi mdun du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pas rung ba gsum bka' stsal te/_sbyin bdag bdag po nyid du mos su gzhug pa dang /[ #]zhal [#]ta byed pa bdag po nyid du
[\[153b.2\]]khas len [#]du gzhug pa dang /_byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de la rung ba dang po'i cho ga ni dge slong gis chos gos kyi zong rin po che dag rnyed pa na blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o/_/rung ba gnyis pa'i cho ga ni dge slong rnams kyis ji
[\[153b.3\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po gang cung zad ci rnyed [#]pa de dag thams cad sbyin bdag zhal ta byed pas kun dga' ra [#]ba'am/_dge bsnyen spro bar bya zhing de'i ming gis bcang bar bya'o/_/rung ba gsum pa'i cho ga ni mi bzung [#]bar mdun du bzhag [#]nas dge slong gi mdun du 'greng
[\[153b.4\]]ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma [#]lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo/_/dngos po rung ba ma lags pa
[\[153b.5\]]'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_nyan pa'i dge slong gis thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rung ba de gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste bdag gir bya ba med pas de la reg
[\[153b.6\]]gam reg tu bcug na [#]yang 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de ni dngos po rung ba ma yin pa rung bar bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/lhung bzed tshol ba'i spang ba'i skabs nas yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol
[\[153b.7\]]zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do/_/dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de [#]dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang [#]bar mi bya/_gzhan la
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sbyin par mi bya bar ma [#]chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim [#]pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya
[\[154a.2\]]ste/_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_
[\[154a.3\]]lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa'o/_/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba
[\[154a.4\]]dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa brims pa [#]dang ma brims pa shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya'o/_/je dang po spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun las [#]lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim par spro'am zhes
[\[154a.5\]]dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro [#]zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te
[\[154a.6\]]las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis
[\[154a.7\]]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim par bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par spro na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim
[\[154b.2\]]par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang gnas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi
[\[154b.3\]]gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang dge 'dun la lhung bzed
[\[154b.4\]]'brel pa med pa 'brim par 'gyur gyis khyod cag nang par gaN+DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed dag thogs la dge 'dun gyi nang du gshegs par mdzod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel ba med na 'brim pa'i dge slong gis phyi de nyin par gnas mal bsham pa
[\[154b.5\]]byas[#] nas gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs [#]pa dag phyung zhing thogs la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim
[\[154b.6\]]pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_gnas brtan lhung bzed 'di ni shin tu gsal ba/_dbyibs legs
[\[154b.7\]]pa/_longs spyod [#]par bzod pa lags kyis gal te bzhed na snoms shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'i bsngags pa brjod de dbul bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kyang gal te 'dod [#]na blang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gyis lhung bzed de blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis [#]lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gnas brtan gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun
[\[155a.2\]]gyi gsar bu gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyi gsar bu la dbul ba'i bar du bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gnyis pas ma blangs na gnas brtan gsum pa la
[\[155a.3\]]dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gsum pas blangs pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang
[\[155a.4\]]'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas ma blangs na gsal bu gnyis pa la 'bul bar bya'o/_/gal te gsal bu gnyis pas ma blangs na gsar bu gsum pa [#]la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gsar bus
[\[155a.5\]]blangs pa na gsar bu gsum pa slong [#]bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing /_brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i bar du bya'o/_/
[\[155a.6\]]dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la dge slong khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di byin gyis [#]brlab par mi bya/_gtang [#]bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bus [#]dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[155a.7\]]lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya ste/_de la bzang po gang yin pa de [#]lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing cig shos
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]su lhung bzed byin gyi brlabs pa [#]gzhug par bya'o/_/des lhung bzed gnyis ka thogs te bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing /_gal te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel ba med pas blang bar bya'o/_/gal te 'bras chan gsher pa rnyed na lhung bzed byis gyis brlabs pas
[\[155b.2\]]blang bar bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te/_lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa mdun du bzhag nas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs par bza' bar bya'o/_/zos zin nas byi dor dang kha zas [#]'bags pa'i dril phyis [#]bya ba yang dang por lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug
[\[155b.3\]]par [#]bya zhing /_de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byis gyis brlabs [#]pa la bya'o/_/bkru ba dang /_skam [#]pa dang /_lci bas brud [#]pa la yang de bzhin [#]bya'o/_/gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag [#]par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin
[\[155b.4\]]gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung gcig yod la/_gal te shod [#]khung bzang na shod du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa [#]gzhag par bya zhing /_ngos khung [#]lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug [#]par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung bzang na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa
[\[155b.5\]]med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rdza bo gnyis yod na rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bsregs[#] par bya zhing /_cig [#]shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa
[\[155b.6\]]bsregs par bya'o/_/gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og tu bzhag pas [#]legs par tshos par gyur na 'og tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_steng du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par tshos par 'gyur na
[\[155b.7\]]steng du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /_'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug [#]par bya'o/_/lam du 'gro na lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bkur bar bya ste/_de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te khur rtsa [#]ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya zhing /_bdag nyid kyis [#]lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bkur bar bya'o/_/gal te khur rtsa [#]ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g.yon
[\[156a.2\]]pas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bkur bar bya zhing /_phrag pa g.yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya'o/_/'di ni de'i chad pa'i las yin te/_tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de ni lhung bzed 'brel ba
[\[156a.3\]]med pa 'brim pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/bsngos pa las bsgyur ba'i spang pa'i skabs nas yang dge slong gang dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la bsgyur du 'jug na spang pa'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i skabs na dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa
[\[156a.4\]]las/_gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu zhig gnas pa der sbyin bdag [#]gis dge 'dun gyi phyir rnyed pa 'bul bar byed na dge slong de gcig pus rnyed pa byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o/_/byin gyis ma brlabs par bdag gir byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa la/_gcig pus
[\[156a.5\]]rnyed[#] pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags ni bdag gnas [#]'di na gcig pu gnas te/_dge 'dun la gos kyi rnyed pa 'di byung bas bdag gis gos 'di nyams su blang ngo /_/dus su byin gyis brlab bo zhes lan gsum sems bskyed par bya/_tshig tu brjod par bya ba yin no/_/
[\[156a.6\]]de ni gcig pus rnyed pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/bsngos pa las bsgyur [#]ba'i spang ba de nyid kyis skabs nas dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las gtsug lag khang gi bdag po bcom mam bcings sam shi'am spyugs na dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang de yal bar mi mdor
[\[156a.7\]]bar dge slong gang gtsug lag khang de la rjes su chags pa shas chen po yod pa/_de de bsrung [#]mar bzhag cing der dge 'dun dang [#]sbyin bdag dus su ma lhags na dge slong des lo lnga ni bsod snyoms kyis 'da' bar bya'o/_/lo gzhan lnga ni nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang dang lhag cig 'tsho ba thun
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mong du bya bas 'da' bar bya zhing gtsug lag khang de dang nye 'khor gyi gtsug lag khang der rnyed pa ni thun mong la gso sbyong ni tha dad pa'i las bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo
[\[156b.2\]]nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba [#]byas te las bya'o/_/des 'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gtsug lag khang 'di'i gtsug lag khang gi bdag
[\[156b.3\]]po bcom mam/_bcings sam/_gum mam/_spyugs [#]na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang 'di dang pha gi ba'i lo lngar rnyed pa ni thun mong la gso sbyong ni tha dad par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol
[\[156b.4\]]pa'o/_las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gtsug lag khang 'di'i gtsug lag khang gi bdag po bcom mam/_bcings sam/_gum mam/_spyugs te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis [#]gtsug lag khang 'di dang pha gi ba'i lo lngar rnyed pa ni thun
[\[156b.5\]]mong la gso sbyong gi [#]tha dad du mdzad kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa gang [#]dag gtsug lag khang 'di dang pha gi ba'i lo lngar rnyed pa ni [#]thun mong la gso sbyong tha dad du mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
[\[156b.6\]]nas/_dge 'dun gyi [#]gtsug lag khang 'di dang pha gi ba'i rnyed pa ni thun mong la gso sbyong ni tha dad du mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni gtsug lag khang gnyis gso sbyong tha dad pa dang rnyed pa thun mong du bya ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/gnas ngan
[\[156b.7\]]len [#]brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas [#]yang dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod [#]na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong dang dge slong ma sdig can dag khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos ba yang bsko [#]bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang
[\[157a.2\]]gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim mi shes pa'o/_/khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya ba/_bskos [#]pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_
[\[157a.3\]]lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya'o/_/je dang por spro bar bya ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong
[\[157a.4\]]'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa [#]byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_
[\[157a.5\]]dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo
[\[157a.6\]]phal po che'i tshogs ma dad pa'i rig [#]par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis
[\[157a.7\]]gnang[#] bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_las ni 'di
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod [#]par bgyid nas/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma
[\[157b.2\]]gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge slong gis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyi na/_tshe dang
[\[157b.3\]]ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim
[\[157b.4\]]rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas khyim rnams su 'di skad ces brjod par bya
[\[157b.5\]]ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod nyon cig khyim rnams su khyim sun par byed pa dang /_gnas rnams su gnas sun par byed pa 'di lta ste/_dper na 'bras sA [#]lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras sA lu de nyid shin te ma dang /_chud za ba dang /_
[\[157b.6\]]tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bu ram shing gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang /_chud za ba dang /_tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag yod kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]khyed cag dge
[\[157b.7\]]slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi/[ #]bcom ldan 'das dang /_gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]ldan dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med pa dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag bzangs [#]dang /_shAri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_gsus po che chen po dang /_skul byed chen po dang /_ka [#]ta'i bu chen po dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang /_chu klung
[\[158a.2\]]'od srungs [#]dang /_ga ya 'od srungs dang /[ #]'gab ma 'od srungs dang /_'od srungs chen po dang /_dga' byed dang /_kim [#]pi la dang /_legs skyes dang /_nam gru dang /_sa ri dang /_nye sde dang /_som nyi [#]nam gru dang /_lam bstan dang /_lam phran bstan dang /_brtag pa'i shing rta dang /_
[\[158a.3\]]chen po ba [#]dang /_grags byin dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la ltos [#]shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de ni khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa de bzhin du khyim
[\[158a.4\]]rnams su so sor go bar [#]byed par mi spro na dge 'dun gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las byas te/_khyim rnams su so sor go bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun
[\[158a.5\]]thams[#] cad [#]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba [#]bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba 'di dang dge slong ma gsal ma 'di ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad
[\[158a.6\]]par rig par 'gyur ba de lta [#]de ltar khyim rnams su spyod [#]par bgyid de/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs [#]ma dad par rig [#]par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid kyang dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so
[\[158a.7\]]sor go bar bgyid par spro ba su la [#]yang ma mchis na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig [#]par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]su spyod par bgyid par gang gis mthong zhing gang du mthong ba des khyim der khyed dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyis bcom ldan 'das
[\[158b.2\]]dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan [#]rnams la ltos [#]shig ces so sor [#]go bar bgyid du stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis kyang so sor rig pa'i khyim dag tu ni so sor go bar bya'i/_so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu ni so sor go bar mi bya'o/_/de ni dge 'dun
[\[158b.3\]]thams cad la gsol ba'i cho ga dang las so//_//bam po bzhi pa/_skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas yang dge slong gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsngos
[\[158b.4\]]pa bdag gis gang zag la bsngo zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings pa la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las kyis ras yug chen [#]sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal
[\[158b.5\]]bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing [#]mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol bar [#]bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun
[\[158b.6\]]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_dge 'dun la yang chos kyi zhal ta bgyid pa'i las la brtson [#]pa lags/[ #]des sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun nam yid du [#]'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am
[\[158b.7\]]yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings [#]la dge 'dun la ni ras yug chen 'byor par mnga' na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la ras yug chen stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gos sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/'phya ba'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas 'phya'am gzhogs [#]'phyas byed na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la/_dge slong gang zag bcu
[\[159a.2\]]gnyis kyi las su bskos ba dang ma bskos pa la ngor 'phya ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis ngor 'phya ba'i grangs [#]su gzhug pa dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas
[\[159a.3\]]gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol [#]ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge
[\[159a.4\]]slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes 'di gnyis 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bogs [#]pa dang zas la bsko bar bskos pa tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor de la ngor 'phya na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge
[\[159a.5\]]'dun gyis dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te
[\[159a.6\]]dris[#] pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong mdza' bo
[\[159a.7\]]dang sa las skyes 'di gnyis 'tshal bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bogs [#]pa dang zas la bsko bar bskos pa tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor de la gzhogs 'phyas bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gyis dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gzhogs 'phyas bgyid ba'i grangs su stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas bsgo ba rna la [#]gzon na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i
[\[159b.2\]]zhar la bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa dang /_cang [#]mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni [#]'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI
[\[159b.3\]]brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la [#]'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan
[\[159b.4\]]pa 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid de/_'di la dge slong don 'tshal ba/_phan pa [#]'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/[ #]bde ba la reg par [#]'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis gzhi de [#]glengs kyang dge slong rnams kyi bsgo ba rna la gzon [#]na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus
[\[159b.5\]]la bab cing bzod [#]na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i
[\[159b.6\]]las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing [#]mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[159b.7\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa 'di ni ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid [#]de/_'di la dge slong don 'tshal ba/_phan pa 'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/_bde ba la reg pa 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis/_gzhi des glengs
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]kyang dge slong rnams la cang mi smra bas rna la gzon na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol
[\[160a.2\]]ba'o/_/de ni bsgo [#]ba rna la gzon pa dang cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/ma bskos par ston [#]pa'i ltung byed kyi [#]skabs nas yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes
[\[160a.3\]]gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong ma'i ston pa bskor bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang /_grong khyer ba'i
[\[160a.4\]]skad dang ldan pa dang /_des dge slong ma la [#]lus kyi [#]reg pas sun ma phyung zhing gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba [#]chos bzhin du slar bya ba'o/[ #]/chos lnga po de dag las bzhi ni nges pa yin no/_/mang du thos pa med na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o/_/de yang [#]med na dge slong
[\[160a.5\]]ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang /_lci ba'i chos brgyad po ston nus pa yang bsko'o/_/de yang med na dge slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu des dge slong ma la lus kyi [#]reg pas sun ma phyung zhing gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de
[\[160a.6\]]chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la/_sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam/_yongs su dag gam/_mthun nam/_kha na [#]ma tho ba med dam/_khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag ni [#]'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam/_khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag
[\[160a.7\]]ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo /_/khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o/_/khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so/_/sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs [#]shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_gso sbyong
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la gso sbyong byas nas/[ #]dge slong ma'i ston pa de dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i ston par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par
[\[160b.2\]]bya'o/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la
[\[160b.3\]]bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston to/_/'di ni gsol pa'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[160b.4\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par spro na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang [#]dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge
[\[160b.5\]]slong ma'i ston par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig[ #]/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnas [#]nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas [#]de de bzhin du
[\[160b.6\]]'dzin to/_/de ni dge slong ma'i ston pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi skabs nas [#]yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las lhag por ma byas par bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la lhag por bya'o zhes
[\[160b.7\]]gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug pa byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba'am bza' ba rnyed cing za bar 'dod na dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas la/_dge slong zas zos [#]zin cing [#]ma spangs la spyod lam
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]las ma nyams pa gang yin pa'am/_dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du tsog pur [#]'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal
[\[161a.2\]]lags shing spangs te/_yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par bgyis pa las bca' ba dang bza' ba rnyed cing 'chal bar 'tshal na/_lhag por bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol/_lhag por byed pa'i dge slong zas zos ma zin ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni
[\[161a.3\]]bdag nyid kyis kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas khyod kyir gyur gyi [#]bzhud cig ces brjod pas lhag por bya'o/_/dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma [#]nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bza' bar mi bya bar lag par byin nas khyod kyir gyur gyi [#]bzhud cig ces brjod pas [#]lhag por
[\[161a.4\]]bya'o/_/de ni lhag por bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed kyis skabs nas dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba las [#]bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo [#]bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong 'ga' la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di
[\[161a.5\]]byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod [#]pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar
[\[161a.6\]]bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bstan [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/
[\[161a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de [#]skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig_/de ni dus dang por bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun
[\[161b.2\]]pa'o[#] zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na/_de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig
[\[161b.3\]]gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su
[\[161b.4\]]gsungs pa gang dag [#]yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la bzhams te bsgo ba [#]yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis
[\[161b.5\]]mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i
[\[161b.6\]]chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom
[\[161b.7\]]ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du
[\[162a.2\]]gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis [#]shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta
[\[162a.3\]]ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la/_'chi ltas khyod ji ltar bcom ldan 'das [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang [#]yin
[\[162a.4\]]pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de
[\[162a.5\]]skad mi gsung ngo /_/'chi ltas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnams grangs du mar [#]gsungs te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_'chi ltas khyod sdig pa can kyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu [#]'di thong shig ces gsol ba
[\[162a.6\]]dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas 'di [#]la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis
[\[162a.7\]]lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni dge slong sdig pa can gyis lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba las
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba'i ltung byed de nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/[# ]dge slong gang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la [#]gsol ba dang
[\[162b.2\]]bzhi'i las kyis sgo [#]yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid [#]bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed na/_de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis smad pa'i las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI
[\[162b.3\]]brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa [#]la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun [#]btsun pa rnams gsan
[\[162b.4\]]du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis
[\[162b.5\]]shes so [#]zhes mchi nas/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad
[\[162b.6\]]'dogs te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i [#]las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad
[\[162b.7\]]'dogs na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las bgyis te/_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/[# ]phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /_dper na gdol bu bzhin du spang ba bgyi zhing mchod tu smad par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/
[\[163a.2\]]las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par
[\[163a.3\]]mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag [#]gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon
[\[163a.4\]]par zhen nas 'di nyid [#]bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen
[\[163a.5\]]nas 'di nyid [#]bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smod pa'i las bgyis te/_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad
[\[163a.6\]]kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar [#]mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /_dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyid na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta
[\[163a.7\]]ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i las bgyi zhing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /_dper na
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing /_mchog tu smad par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig[ #]/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
[\[163b.2\]]nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad cing /_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi [#]lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu [#]'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam
[\[163b.3\]]'dre bar [#]mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /_dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyis shing /_mchog tu smad par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/'di ni dge slong sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la smad pa'i cho ga dang las
[\[163b.4\]]so/_/bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi spong ba la [#]bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_/dge tshul gang la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]'dod pa dag ni
[\[163b.5\]]bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes zer na/_dge tshul de la dge slong rnams kyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ste/_
[\[163b.6\]]tsher ma dang chen po ba khyed gnyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag [#]gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom
[\[163b.7\]]ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa bar du gcod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]te/_de dag bsten na bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis/_tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig_/de ni dus dang por bya ba'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de la bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi [#]de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung
[\[164a.2\]]zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs [#]par byed na de [#]gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bsgo bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag
[\[164a.3\]]par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dge tshul de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig [#]gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[164a.4\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi
[\[164a.5\]]'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag [#]gis shes so zhes mchi [#]nas/_'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par
[\[164a.6\]]zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis [#]dge tshul tsher ma dang [#]/_chen po pa la/[# ]tsher ma dang chen po pa khyed gnyis ji ltar
[\[164a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_'di [#]ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa [#]dag ni bar du gcod pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar gsungs te/_de dag [#]bsten na bar du gcod par
[\[164b.2\]]'gyur gyis/_tsher ma dang [#]chen po pa khyed gnyis sdig pa can gyi [#]lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba [#]mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis dge tshul de la khyod la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las
[\[164b.3\]]mdzad par 'gyur ba las/_gsol ba mdzad lags kyis khyod sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bsgo ba na gzhi [#]de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na de'i 'og tu las bya'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun
[\[164b.4\]]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa 'di gnyis la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom
[\[164b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_'di gnyis la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di gnyis la bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni
[\[164b.6\]]brdzun [#]pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge tshul tsher ma dang chen po pa la tsher ma dang [#]chen po pa khyed gnyis/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa dag [#]ni bar du gcod pa'o zhes gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[164b.7\]]de [#]ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag cag gis shes so zhes de [#]skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pa ma 'debs shig_/bcom ldan 'das la skur pas legs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de skad mi gsung ngo /_/tsher ma dang chen po pa 'dod pa ni
[\[165a\]]
