[\[184b.2\]]sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma chos byin
[\[184b.3\]]'di rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags [#]la 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rngo mi thog [#]nas dge slong ma [#]chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di/_dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang [#]'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams
[\[184b.4\]]kyis [#]dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las
[\[184b.5\]]ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma chos byin 'di rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la/_'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar [#]rngo mi thog nas/_dge slong ma chos byin rgan po [#]rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun
[\[184b.6\]]las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa
[\[184b.7\]]dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni rgan mo la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gser dngul
[\[185a.2\]]la reg pa [#]spang ba'i skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang rang gis gser dang dngul len nam/_len du 'jug na yang [#]spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa de la 'di snyam du dgongs te kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin [#]par byed la/_nga'i nyan thos ma rnams
[\[185a.3\]]kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyi [#]ngas nyan thos ma rnams la rung bar bya ba cung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong mas zhal ta byed par spro bar bya'o/_/
[\[185a.4\]]gzhan yang dge slong mas blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong ma'i mdun du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pas rung ba gsum bka' stsal te/_sbyin bdag bdag po nyid du mos su gzhug pa dang /_zhal ta byed pa bdag po nyid du khas len du gzhug pa dang /_byin gyis
[\[185a.5\]]brlab par bya ba'o/_/de la rung ba dang po'i cho ga ni dge slong mas chos gos kyi zong rin po che dag rnyed pa na blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o/_/rung ba gnyis pa'i cho ga ni dge slong ma rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos
[\[185a.6\]]po gang cung zad ci snyed [#]pa de thams cad sbyin bdag zhal ta byed pa kun dga' ra ba'am dge bsnyen spro bar bya zhing de'i ming gis bcang bar bya'o/_/rung ba gsum pa'i cho ga ni mi gzung bar mdun du bzhag nas dge slong ma'i mdun du 'greng ste/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/'phags ma
[\[185a.7\]]dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo/_/dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub [#]par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_nyan pa'i dge slong mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rung ba de gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste/_bdag gir [#]bya ba med pas de la reg gam reg tu bcug na yang 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/
[\[185b.2\]]de ni dngos po rung ba ma yin pa rung bar bya ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/lhung bzed tshol ba'i skabs nas/_yang dge slong ma gang dag [#]lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung
[\[185b.3\]]byed do/_/dge slong ma des lhung bzed de dge slong ma'i 'khor la dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i 'khor gyi lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong ma de la dge slong ma khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par
[\[185b.4\]]mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par [#]bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la/_lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel ba
[\[185b.5\]]med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_lhung bzed
[\[185b.6\]]'brel ba med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa mi shes pa'o/_/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim [#]pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/[ #]'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi
[\[185b.7\]]'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa brims pa dang ma brims pa shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya'o/_/je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i [#]dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pa med pa 'brim par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge
[\[186a.2\]]'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba [#]byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
[\[186a.3\]]dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
[\[186a.4\]]'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bsko ste/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun [#]lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag
[\[186a.5\]]la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'grel ba med pa 'brim par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim par bsko na/_
[\[186a.6\]]'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas/_
[\[186a.7\]]dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong ma'i kun tu spyod pa'i
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong mas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs pa'i dus su dge 'dun la 'phags ma dag bdag sang dge 'dun la lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim par 'gyur gyis/_khyed cag nang par gaN+DI
[\[186b.2\]]brdungs pa na rang rang gi nang du lhung bzed dag thogs la dge 'dun gyi nang du gshegs par mdzod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong mas phyi de nyin par gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i
[\[186b.3\]]tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi lhung bzed dag byin gyis brlab pa phyung zhing thogs te dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/de nas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa'i dge slong mas dge
[\[186b.4\]]slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa thogs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_gnas brtan lhung bzed 'di ni shin tu gsal ba
[\[186b.5\]]dbyibs legs [#]pa longs spyod [#]par bzod pa lags kyi/[ #]gal te bzhed na snoms shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa'i bsngags pa brjod de dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kyang gal te 'dod na blang
[\[186b.6\]]bar bya'o/_gal te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis lhung bzed de blangs na dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gnas brtan gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de gnas
[\[186b.7\]]brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gnyis pa'i lhung bzed gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyi gsar bu la dbul ba'i bar du bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na gnas brtan gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]te gnas brtan gnyis pas ma blangs na gnas brtan gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gsum pas blangs pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin
[\[187a.2\]]par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis [#]'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas ma blangs na gsar bu gnyis pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal
[\[187a.3\]]te gsar bu gnyis pas ma blangs na gsar bu gsum pa la dbul bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gsar bus blangs pa na gsar bu gsum pas blong [#]bar byed na brjod pa dang po la sbyin par mi bya zhing brjod pa gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/brjod pa gsum pa la sbyin par
[\[187a.4\]]bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gsar bu gsum pas 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags pa'i bar du bya'o/_/dge slong ma'i 'khor de'i lhung bzed tham mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong ma de la dge slong ma khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/[ #]gtang
[\[187a.5\]]bar mi bya/_gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag [#]pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya'o/_/lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong ma'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'chang ba'i dge slong
[\[187a.6\]]mas lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya ste/_de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlab pa gzhug par bya'o/_/des lhung bzed gnyi ga thogs te bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing /_gal
[\[187a.7\]]te 'bras chan skam po rnyed na lhung bzed 'brel ba med pas blang bar [#]bya'o/_/gal te 'bras chan gsher pa rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pas blang bar [#]bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang [#]du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa mdun du bzhag [#]nas lhung bzed byin
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gyis brlabs par bza' bar bya'o/_/zos zin na [#]byi dor dang kha zas 'bags pa'i dril phyi bya ba yang dang por lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa la bya zhing de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa la bya'o/_/bkru ba dang /_bskam pa dang /_lci bas drud pa la yang de
[\[187b.2\]]bzhin bya'o/_/gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa [#]gzhug par bya zhing cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung gcig yod la/_gal te shod khung [#]bzang na gcig tu
[\[187b.3\]]lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /_ngos khung du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal te ngos khung bzang [#]na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/
[\[187b.4\]]lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rdza bo [#]gnyis yod na/_rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bsreg par [#]bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bsreg [#]par bya'o/_/gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og ma legs par tshos
[\[187b.5\]]par gyur na/_'og tu lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_steng du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par tshos par gyur na/_steng du lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhag [#]par bya zhing /_'og tu lhung
[\[187b.6\]]bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug [#]par bya'o/_/lam du 'gro na lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bkur bar bya ste/_de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing /_cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/gal
[\[187b.7\]]te khur rtsa [#]ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la [#]lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya zhing /_bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bkur bar bya'o/_/gal te khur rtsa [#]ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g.yon pas lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa bkur bar bya zhing /_phrag pa
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]g.yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya'o/_/'di ni de'i chad pa'i las yin te/_tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de ni lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa 'brim pa bsko ba'i
[\[188a.2\]]cho ga dang las so/_/gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na/_dge 'dun gyi gnang ba ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la/_dge slong dang dge slong ma
[\[188a.3\]]sdig pa can dag khyim rnams so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang [#]bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya
[\[188a.4\]]ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim mi [#]shes pa'o/_/khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma
[\[188a.5\]]chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_go bar byas pa dang
[\[188a.6\]]ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya'o/_/je dang po [#]spro bar bya ste/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro'o
[\[188a.7\]]zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci [#]nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim
[\[188b.2\]]rnams su spyod par bgyid de/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi [#]dus la bab cing [#]bzod na/_dge 'dun 'phags ma
[\[188b.3\]]rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su
[\[188b.4\]]so sor go bar bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim
[\[188b.5\]]rnams su spyod par bgyid nas/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyi bar [#]spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar
[\[188b.6\]]bgyid par bsko ste/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang /_dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid na 'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni
[\[188b.7\]]cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas khyim rnams su 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan
[\[189a.2\]]pa dag khyed nyon cig_/khyim rnams su khyim sun par byed pa dang /_gnas rnams su gnas sun par byed pa 'di lta ste/_dper na/_'bras sA lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras sA lu de nyid shin te ma dang chud za
[\[189a.3\]]ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bu ram shing gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na/_'di ltar [#]bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag yod kyis/_tshe dang ldan
[\[189a.4\]]pa dag_/khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan [#]pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi/[ #]bcom ldan 'das dang /_gnas brtan kun
[\[189a.5\]]shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag bzangs [#]dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_gsus po che chen po dang /_skul byed
[\[189a.6\]]chen po dang /_ka ta'i [#]bu chen po dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang /_chu klung 'od srungs dang /_ga ya 'od srungs dang /_'gab ma 'od srungs dang /_'od srungs chen po dang /_dga' byed dang /_kim pi [#]la dang /_legs skyes dang /_nam gru dang /_sa ri dang /_
[\[189a.7\]]nye sde dang /_som nyi nam gru dang /_lam bstan [#]dang /_lam phran bstan [#]dang /_brtag pa'i shing dang /_chen [#]po pa dang /_grags byin dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la ltos [#]shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de ni khyim
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]rnams su so sor go bar byed pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong ma [#]khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par mi spro na/_dge 'dun gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las byas te khyim rnams su so sor [#]go bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas
[\[189b.2\]]mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas so/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad
[\[189b.3\]]ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma 'di ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de/_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma
[\[189b.4\]]gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma [#]dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid kyang /_dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dus la bab
[\[189b.5\]]cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba/_de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid par gang gis mthong zhing gang du thos pa des
[\[189b.6\]]khyim der khyed dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan [#]pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig_/dge slong 'di dang /_dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la ltos [#]shig
[\[189b.7\]]ces so sor go bar bgyid du stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_dge 'dun gyis kyang so sor rig pa'i khyim dag tu so sor go bar bya'i so sor ma rig pa'i khyim dag tu ni so sor go bar mi bya'o/_/de ni dge 'dun thams cad la gsol ba'i cho ga dang las so//_//
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bam po drug pa/_skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs [#]rngam par gyur te/_dge slong ma rnams la 'di skad ces 'phags ma dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te
[\[190a.2\]]dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gis [#]gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong ma chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings pa la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las kyis ras yug chen sbyin par [#]bya'o zhes
[\[190a.3\]]gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba [#]bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug
[\[190a.4\]]la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_/'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog 'di ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_dge 'dun la yang chos kyi zhal ta bgyid pa'i las la brtson pa lags la/_des
[\[190a.5\]]sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong ma rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang [#]bas chos gos lnga ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings la/_dge 'dun la ni ras yug
[\[190a.6\]]chen 'byor bar [#]mnga' na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog la ras yug chen stsol to/_/'di ni gsol
[\[190a.7\]]ba'o/_de [#]ni gos sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/'phya ba'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas/_'phya'am gzhogs 'phyas byed na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la dge slong ma gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las su bskos pa [#]dang ma bskos pa la ngor 'phya [#]ba dang gzhogs 'phyas byed pa gsol
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su gzhug pa dang gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge slong
[\[190b.2\]]ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong ma gcig gi gsol ba bya'o [#]'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo 'di 'tshal bzhin du dge slong
[\[190b.3\]]ma gang dge 'dun mthun pas [#]gnas mal 'bogs [#]pa dang /_zas la bsko bar bskos pa 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog 'di la ngor 'phya na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge
[\[190b.4\]]'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbom dga' mo ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/'di ni ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa
[\[190b.5\]]byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis [#]gsol ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags
[\[190b.6\]]ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo 'di 'tshal bzhin du dge slong ma gang dge 'dun mthun pas gnas mal 'bogs [#]pa dang /_zas la bsko bar bskos pa 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog de la gzhogs 'phyas bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags
[\[190b.7\]]ma rnams kyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbom dga' mo gzhogs 'phyas bgyid pa'i grangs su stsal [#]to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i grangs
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas/_bsgo ba rna la gzon na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la/_bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las kyis bsgo ba rna
[\[191a.2\]]la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa dang cang mi smra bar rna la gzon pa'i grangs su [#]gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad
[\[191a.3\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid de/_
[\[191a.4\]]'di la dge slong ma don 'tshal ba/_phan pa 'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/_bde ba la reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis gzhi des glengs kyang dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgo ba rna la gzon na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi [#]dus la
[\[191a.5\]]bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbom dga' mo bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga
[\[191a.6\]]dang las so/_/cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su [#]gzhug pa'i las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la [#]yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur
[\[191a.7\]]pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba [#]bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo 'di ltung ba byung yang chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid de/_'di la dge slong ma
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]don 'tshal ba/_phan pa 'tshal ba/_bde ba 'tshal ba/_bde ba la reg par 'tshal ba/_grub pa dang bde ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis gzhi de glengs [#]kyang dge slong ma rnams la cang mi smra bas rna la gzon na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge
[\[191b.2\]]'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbom dga' mo cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/
[\[191b.3\]]skyes pa [#]dang lhan cig tu [#]nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas bu dang lhan cig nyal ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge
[\[191b.4\]]'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rim bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste/_thal mo [#]sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la
[\[191b.5\]]gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ma sbed ma las [#]bu 'od srungs gzhon du btsas te/_bdag dge slong ma sbed ma dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis
[\[191b.6\]]thugs brtse [#]ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ma sbed ma la bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na [#]nyal ba'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas de ni bu dang lhan cig nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas
[\[191b.7\]]te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbed ma 'di las bu 'od srungs gzhon nu btsas nas dge slong ma sbed ma 'di dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bu dang lhan cig
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]khyim gcig tu nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod [#]na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbed ma la bu dang lhan cig tu khyim
[\[192a.2\]]gcig tu nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma sbed ma 'di las bu 'od srungs gzhon nu btsas nas dge slong ma sbed ma dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bu dang
[\[192a.3\]]lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbed ma la bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma sbed ma la bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal
[\[192a.4\]]ba'i gnang ba gsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma sbed ma [#]bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang
[\[192a.5\]]ba gsol lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni bu dang lhan cig nyal ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/'khor nye bar 'jog [#]pa'i ltung byed kyi [(]sgabs [,]skabs [)]nas/_dge slong ma 'khor nye bar 'jog nus pa bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo bcu
[\[192a.6\]]gnyis lon pa la [#]'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par
[\[192a.7\]]gyur pa la dge slong ma des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan rim bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_bdag dge
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags te 'khor nye bar 'jog par spro nas/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes [#]bgyi ba dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma
[\[192b.2\]]rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog [#]la lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de ni 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol ba'o/_/de'i
[\[192b.3\]]'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags te/_'khor nye bar
[\[192b.4\]]'jog par spro nas/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rngo yang thog la lo bcu [#]gnyis kyang lon lags pa 'di/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags
[\[192b.5\]]ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog [#]la lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags na/[ #]'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma
[\[192b.6\]]rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la lo bcu [#]gnyis kyang lon lags te 'khor nye bar 'jog par spro na/[ #]dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa 'di/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams
[\[192b.7\]]las 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la [#]'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol na/_'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma ming 'di
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba stsal [#]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing
[\[193a.2\]]gnang nas/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i
[\[193a.3\]]gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas dge slong ma 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog nus pa/_bsnyen par rdzos nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa la 'khor [#]mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_
[\[193a.4\]]gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan rim bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas rgan
[\[193a.5\]]pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags te 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog par spro
[\[193a.6\]]nas/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams la 'khor mang po nye bar 'dog pa'i [#]gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse [#]ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu
[\[193a.7\]]gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba [#]stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de ni 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags te 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog par spro nas/_dge slong ma ming 'di
[\[193b.2\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa 'di dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod
[\[193b.3\]]cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag
[\[193b.4\]]la gsan du gsol/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags te/_'khor mang po nye bar 'jog par spro nas/_dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa 'di dge 'dun 'phags ma
[\[193b.5\]]rnams las 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba gsol na/[ #]'phags ma gang dag
[\[193b.6\]]dge[#] slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa la/_'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing
[\[193b.7\]]gnang nas/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rngo yang thog la/_lo bcu gnyis kyang lon lags pa/[ #]'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba stsol lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni 'khor mang po
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/bslab pa bral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba'i skabs nas sbyin bdag longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su zad de yongs su mthar thug par gyur pa la bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin par
[\[194a.2\]]bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis [#]dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/_/
[\[194a.3\]]'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_/dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du
[\[194a.4\]]'thad pa'i dge slong ma rnams la ma phul ba'i yongs su ma btang [#]ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge
[\[194a.5\]]'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa der dge slong mas khyim du 'gro bar bya/_stan la
[\[194a.6\]]longs spyad [#]par bya/_chos bstan par bya'o/_/bsod snyoms blang bar mi bya/[ #]lhung bzed stong pas 'jug par mi bya'o/_/de'i byis pa slong ba dag la bca' ba ril por mi sbyin par dum bur byas te sbyin par bya'o/_/ga gon dang la phug la sogs pa 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag dang
[\[194a.7\]]ldam ldum la sogs pa tshod ma khyim nas byung na blang bar bya'o/_/de ni bslab pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas sbyin bdag de longs spyod 'phel bar gyur pa la khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la sbyin bdag des phyag 'tshal te/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas
[\[194b.2\]]thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_bdag dmag dpon seng ge dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_bdag gis 'di lta ste sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad
[\[194b.3\]]pa'i dge slong ma rnams la ma [#]phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_bdag gis de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te/_yongs su mthar thug nas dge 'dun don bzhed pa/_phan pa [#]bzhed pas bdag la bslab
[\[194b.4\]]pa'i sdom pa stsal ba las bdag dmag dpon seng ge yang longs spyod 'phel nas bdag dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom ba stsal ba bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i
[\[194b.5\]]sdom pa gzhig pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de ni bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa gsol ba'o/_/de'i 'og tu sbyin bdag de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te mthong pa'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas/_dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig
[\[194b.6\]]gi las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid
[\[194b.7\]]du 'thad pa'i dge slong ma rnams la ma phul ba'am yongs [#]su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te/_yongs su mthar thug nas de la dge 'dun don bzhed pa phan pa bzhed pas bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]ba las dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te/_dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge
[\[195a.2\]]'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa der dge slong ma rnams kyis [#]'gro
[\[195a.3\]]bar bya/_stan la longs spyad [#]par bya/_bsod snyoms blang bar bya/_chos bstan par bya'o/_/de ni khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste/_mtshams kyi nang na
[\[195a.4\]]dge slong ma ji snyed 'khod pa thams cad bsdu ni mi dgos [#]te/_gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong ma gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa [#]dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong ma de dag la phyag 'tshal te/_rgan pa'i mtha'
[\[195a.5\]]logs[#] su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/'phags ma dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rig pa'i [#]so sor bshags bar bya ba byung gi [#]chos de so sor 'chags so zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o/_/de ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam par brjod pas
[\[195a.6\]]so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no/_/bshags pa ni ji ltar ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/_/de ni so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/dge
[\[195a.7\]]slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so//_//da [##]ni gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams brjod par bya ste/_sdom la/_sbong pa[#] dang ni gnas dang mtshams/_/mi 'bral dgrol dang bcad pa dang /_/mtshams chen gnang nas
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]cig car dgrol/_/cig car bcad dang chos gos dang /_/mtshams ma bcad dang yongs dag dang /_/'dun dang gnyi ga smyos dang 'bad/_/'du dang gnod [#]dang dran pa dang /_/yid gnyis dran dang yid gnyis dang /_/ltung ba mthu [#]dang yid gnyis gyur/_/rtsod dang ngos [#]nyid ma yin dang /_/
[\[195b.2\]]gcig la sogs pas byin brlab [#]pa'i/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi la zhi gnas kyis gso sbyong gi skabs nas dge slong spong [#]ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong spong pa'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma
[\[195b.3\]]bskos[#] pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa'o/_/dge slong spong pa'i zhal ta byed pa
[\[195b.4\]]chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes
[\[195b.5\]]pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya'o/_/je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi [#]spong ba'i zhal ta byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro'o [#]zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i
[\[195b.6\]]tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur ba la/_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
[\[195b.7\]]gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]par bsko ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di [#]zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong pa'i zhal ta
[\[196a.2\]]bgyid par [#]spro ste/_de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta
[\[196a.3\]]bgyid par bsgo zhing /_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi spong
[\[196a.4\]]ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing /_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do/_/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du [#]'dzin to/_/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas spong
[\[196a.5\]]ba'i khang par chag chag gdab par bya/_phyag dar bya/_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku [#]bar bya/_stan bsham [#]par bya'o/_/bshang ba'i sa dang gci ba'i [#]sa byi dor bya/_chag chag gdab par bya/_phyag dar bya/_lci ba sar ba'i byug pas bsku [#]bar bya/_lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya/_
[\[196a.6\]]bong rdog dang sa dang chu gzhag par bya'o/_/bsdu pa'i phyir khang stengs nas khar [#]gsil gsil ba'am/_gaN+DI chung ngu brdung ngo /_/dus shes par byas nas rgyun [#]chags gsum pa ran par gdon cing ci bder bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa ran par bya'o/_/dge slong
[\[196a.7\]]spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gyes [#]par bya zhing thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o/_/gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na [#]des phyogs dben [#]par lde mig sbas te tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyi [#]phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de ni spong
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko [#]ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi skabs nas dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_byas pa'am/_zin pa nang
[\[196b.2\]]mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o/_/'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo
[\[196b.3\]]nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/[ #]/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis
[\[196b.4\]]pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom [#]gang dang bcas pa'i [#]dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig [#]dang /_dge 'dun gyi [#]gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis
[\[196b.5\]]pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa ni dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa
[\[196b.6\]]bgyis[#] pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi [#]gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi [#]gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
[\[196b.7\]]dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun thams cad kyi [#]gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]par bgyi bar [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub ba'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
[\[197a.2\]]dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis gang du gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba
[\[197a.3\]]dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/de ni gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya ba'i cho ga dang las so/_gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs nas/_dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
[\[197a.4\]]chen po gcad [#]par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum [#]gyi mtha' tshun chad du mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po pha 'ong [#]dang rtsig [#]pa 'am ka ba'i [#]shing ljon pa
[\[197a.5\]]'am [#]ra ba 'am bya skyibs sam lam po che'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong [#]ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun
[\[197a.6\]]par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po btsugs [#]pa dag brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par
[\[197a.7\]]bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'di na [#]dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha 'ong [#]gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/[ #]ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun
[\[197b.2\]]gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du dge 'dun gyis grong
[\[197b.3\]]dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug
[\[197b.4\]]mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha 'ong [#]gi mtshan ma 'am rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i
[\[197b.5\]]mtshan ma 'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas
[\[197b.6\]]bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg [#]par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig
[\[197b.7\]]pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong khyer gyi nye [#]'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad par bzod pa de dag
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu [#]ba dang /_dge
[\[198a.2\]]slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]gang du mtshams
[\[198a.3\]]chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mtshams bcad pa la ni 'dun pa 'bul bas de dang mthun pa mi 'grub ste/_mtshams der gtogs
[\[198a.4\]]pa'i dge slong thams cad las kyi gnas der 'du bar bya'o/_/de ni mtshams chen po bcad pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs nas mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag [#]dang mi 'bral [#]ba'i gnang ba
[\[198a.5\]]sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/
[\[198a.6\]]'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di [#]dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las [#]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge
[\[198a.7\]]'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /[ #]dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to/_/'di
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_
[\[198b.2\]]dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par
[\[198b.3\]]gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba [#]stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni [#]cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge
[\[198b.4\]]'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal [#]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyis [#]chos gos dag dang 'bral
[\[198b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de ni chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas
[\[198b.6\]]kyi skabs nas/_mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por mtshams chen po bkrol ba de'i 'og tu mtshams bu chung [#]bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par bya'o/_/mtshams chen po ni 'di ltar dgrol bar
[\[198b.7\]]bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta [#]ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_
[\[199a.2\]]dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po
[\[199a.3\]]bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang
[\[199a.4\]]po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po bshig cing bkrol [#]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni mtshams chen po dgrol ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/
[\[199a.5\]]de'i 'og tu mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams [#]bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am srad bus [#]bres pa'am rdo
[\[199a.6\]]bzhag pa 'am srol btod [#]pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge
[\[199a.7\]]slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po btsugs pa dag brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams [#]bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pas [#]btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni [#]srad bus [#]bres pa lags/_nub phyogs
[\[199b.2\]]su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg
[\[199b.3\]]par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis
[\[199b.4\]]mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan [#]po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pas [#]btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni srad bus [#]bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod [#]pa brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun
[\[199b.5\]]gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg [#]par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chang bcad cing dkyil 'khor blo mthun par mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas
[\[199b.6\]]bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge
[\[199b.7\]]'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi nang [#]du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mtshams
[\[200a.2\]]bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa ni gcig tu ma nges te/_gal te 'dod na ni sbyin par bya'o/_/de ni mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par bya ba'i cho ga
[\[200a.3\]]dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs dge slong dag gis mtshams chen po bkrol te mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa'i 'og tu/_yang gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad
[\[200a.4\]]par[#] bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_snga ma bzhin du je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po pha bong ngam/_rtsig pa'am/_ka ba'am shing ljon pa
[\[200a.5\]]'am/_ra ba'am bya skyibs sam/_lam po che'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun
[\[200a.6\]]par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po btsugs pa dag brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par
[\[200a.7\]]bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa [#]rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa [#]shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po [#]lags/_lho
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun
[\[200b.2\]]gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du dge 'dun
[\[200b.3\]]gyis grong [#]dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug [#]pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na [#]dge slong gnas
[\[200b.4\]]pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub
[\[200b.5\]]phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta
[\[200b.6\]]ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong
[\[200b.7\]]gcig pa'i gnas kyis sdom pa [#]'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par [#]dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba
[\[201a.2\]]la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der
[\[201a.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mtshams bcad pa ni 'dun pa 'bul bas de dang mthun pa mi 'grub ste/_mtshams der gtogs pa'i dge slong thams cad kyi
[\[201a.4\]]las[#] kyi gnas der 'du bar bya'o/_/de ni dge slong dag gis mtshams chen po bkrol te mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa'i 'og tu yang dge slong gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso
[\[201a.5\]]sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs nas dge slong gang dag gis mtshams chen po bkrol te mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa'i 'og tu yang gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad nas yang
[\[201a.6\]]mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_snga ma bzhin du gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun
[\[201a.7\]]thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du
[\[201b.2\]]dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas
[\[201b.3\]]mtshams chen po bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas [#]'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi [#]chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_tshe
[\[201b.4\]]dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang
[\[201b.5\]]dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge
[\[201b.6\]]'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/_'di la \u0f71'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de ni dge slong dag gis mtshams chen
[\[201b.7\]]po bkrol te/_mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par byas pa'i 'og tu yang gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad nas yang mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi [#]gnas kyi skabs nas las byed pa gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig [#]car dgol ba dang bcad du rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni [#]'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por mtshams chen po dang mtshams
[\[202a.2\]]bu chung bkrol [#]zhing dkyil 'khor ba gzhig par bya'o/_/'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la mtshams gnyi gar dge
[\[202a.3\]]'dun bkod de dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi gar shing ngam dbyug pa'am gseg [#]gam re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas de las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir
[\[202a.4\]]dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams [#]bu chung bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun [#]par bgyis pa/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshams
[\[202a.5\]]chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste dkyil 'khor pa dgrol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
[\[202a.6\]]chen po bcad cing mtshams [#]bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bgyis pa de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung
[\[202a.7\]]yang gzhig ste dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]chen po bshig cing mtshams bu chung yang bshig nas/_dkyil 'khor ba bkrol [#]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de [#]de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni las byed pa gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig car dgrol ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/las byed pa
[\[202b.2\]]gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig car bcad pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi [#]mtha' tshun chad du mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po pha 'ong [#]ngam/_rtsig
[\[202b.3\]]pa'am/_ka ba'am/_shing ljon pa'am/_ra ba'am/_bya skyibs sam/_lam po che'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po dang /_mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po seng ldeng gi phur pas [#]btab pa'am/_srad bus [#]bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa
[\[202b.4\]]'am/_srol btod [#]pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun [#]par gyur pa la/_dge slong gnas
[\[202b.5\]]pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po dang mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po btsugs pa dag brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu mtshams gnyi gar dge 'dun bkod da[#] dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi gar shing ngam dbyug pa'am gseg [#]gam re
[\[202b.6\]]ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan
[\[202b.7\]]ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha 'ong [#]gi mtshan ma 'am rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]lam po che'i mtshan ma'am khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po [#]brjod pa [#]shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pas btab [#]pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni srad bus bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su
[\[203a.2\]]ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas
[\[203a.3\]]bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par
[\[203a.4\]]mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni
[\[203a.5\]]pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ba'am bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am
[\[203a.6\]]khron pa la [#]sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su [#]seng ldeng gi phur pas btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su srad bus bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol
[\[203a.7\]]btod [#]pa brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu pa dang /_
[\[203b.2\]]dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni
[\[203b.3\]]cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas
[\[203b.4\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams [#]chung ngu yang bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/
[\[203b.5\]]dge 'dun gyi [#]gang du mtshams chen po dang mtshams bu chung cig car bcad de dkyil 'khor par blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/_gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis kyis las [#]dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_de ni
[\[203b.6\]]las byed pa gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig car bcad ba'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi gnas kyi skabs nas las byed pa [#]gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig car bcad nas de'i 'og tu mtshams chen
[\[203b.7\]]po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_mtshams bu chung gi nang nas phyir byung ste/_mtshams chen por gnas mal bsham [#]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas
[\[204a.2\]]'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste gnas bsdu [#]ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg
[\[204a.3\]]par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang ma 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di dge 'dun
[\[204a.4\]]mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang
[\[204a.5\]]'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag [#]'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal
[\[204a.6\]]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar gnang ba stsal lags te/_
[\[204a.7\]]'di ltar cang [#]mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis [#]gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang [#]smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/_'di
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de ni las byed pa gcig gis tshig gcig gis mtshams gnyis cig [#]car bcad nas de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/mtshams
[\[204b.2\]]ma bcad pa'i gnas su ni las la rtsig pas bskor ba yin na [#]rtsig pa mtshams yin na/_rtsig pas ma bskor na wa kha nas chu 'dzag pa gang du bab [#]pa tshun cad [#]mtshams yin no/_/grong la ni nye 'khor gyi mtha' tshun cad [#]mtshams yin no/_/dgon pa la ni phyogs phyogs su
[\[204b.3\]]rgyang grangs kyi mtha' tshun cad [#]mtshams yin te/_dge slong mtshams de dag gi nang na 'khod pa rnams kyis der 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du
[\[204b.4\]]'gyur ro//_//bam po bdun pa/_gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs nas/_gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid [#]mtshams kyi nang na dge slong na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyi rkyen gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su 'du
[\[204b.5\]]bar mi nus pa [#]yod na de dag nyid yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir de'i yongs su dag par blang bar [#]bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong yongs su dag pa len pa gcig gis yongs su dag par 'bul ba gcig dang gnyis dang rab tu mang po rnams kyi yang rung ste/_dge 'dun gyi nang
[\[204b.6\]]du ji snyed kyi ming dag brjod par nus pa'i bar dag gi yongs su dag pa [#]blang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_dge skos kyis gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang zhing ma lhags pa dngos su yod dam/_glo bur du 'ongs pa la sogs pa yod par 'khrigs [#]na gso sbyong
[\[204b.7\]]bcwa lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad las kyi gnas su tshogs pas dge slong yongs su dag pa len pa chos lnga dang ldan pa gcig gam gnyis sam gsum tshig gis bsko [#]bar bya zhing /_des btsal ba [#]dang bod pa dang mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su [#]lta ba la sogs pa dag gis
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]bsam pa thag pa nas mtshams kyi nang btsal te ma lhags pa rnams la deng dge 'dun gso sbyong mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag gam zhes dri bar bya zhing ma lhags pa rnams kyi de la yongs su dag pa dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[205a.2\]]dge slong yongs su dag pa 'bul [#]bar byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed pas mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan pa la phyag byas nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad
