[\[205a.3\]]ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyis [#]gso sbyong bco lnga ba lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba [#]bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong bro tshal ba sdug
[\[205a.4\]]bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes bdag mchi'o/_/bdag gi [#]gso sbyong yang yongs su dag ste/_yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig [#]par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_
[\[205a.5\]]dge slong yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed pas gal te de skad brjod mi nus na lus sam/_ngag gam/_lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed na/[ #]yongs su dag pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/lus sam/_ngag gam/_lus dang ngag gi rnam par byed
[\[205a.6\]]kyis[#] yongs su dag pa 'bul bar byed mi nus na dge 'dun thams cad der 'dong zhing gso sbyong bya ba'am/_yang na dge slong de dge 'dun gyi nang du blangs te gso sbyong bya'o/_/dge slong yongs su dag pa len pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong yongs su dag pa
[\[205a.7\]]len pas yongs su dag pa blangs nas brgyug par mi bya zhing /_mgyogs par mi bya/_mchong par mi bya/_phyi rol la mchong [#]bar mi bya/_'obs la mchong [#]bar mi bya/_bang rim la mchong [#]bar mi bya/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis skas kyi rim pa gnyis la thod rgal du 'dzeg par mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis them skas kyi them pa gnyis la thod rgal du 'dzeg par mi bya/_chu lkog ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya/_gnyid log par mi bya/_snyoms par 'jug par mi
[\[205b.2\]]bya bar dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing /_gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis [#]tshe dang ldan pa dag ma lhags pa rnams kyi yongs su dag pa brjod cig_/brjod pa yang rig [#]par gyis shig ces smras pa'i tshe des dge slong ma [#]yang na dge 'dun la de'i yongs su dag
[\[205b.3\]]pa dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong la 'bul na ni des dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug
[\[205b.4\]]bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de [#]bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o/_/de'i gso sbyong yang
[\[205b.5\]]yongs su dag go/_/yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod par [#]yang rig par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun la 'bul na ni des dge 'dun gyi dbus su rgan pa'i mthar 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[205b.6\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro
[\[205b.7\]]'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bar chad kyi [#]chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o/_/de'i gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go/_/yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o/_/dge
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]slong yongs su dag pa len pas yongs su dag pa blangs te dge 'dun gyi nang du ma phyin par de nyid dam lam khar [#]rgyun chad cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na yongs su dag pa ma blangs pa yin te yang blang bar [#]bya'o/_/dge
[\[206a.2\]]'dun gyi nang du phyin nas rgyun chad cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na ma brjod kyang yongs su dag pa blangs pa yin te yang blangs bar mi bya'o/_/de ni dge slong bdag nyid yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa 'bul ba'i cho ga dang sngags
[\[206a.3\]]so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i [#]gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs nas/_gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la mtshams kyi nang na dge slong na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyi rkyen gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su 'du bar mi nus pa des bdag nyid
[\[206a.4\]]yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa phul na dge 'dun dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de'i 'dun pa [#]blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong 'dun pa len pa gcig gis [#]'dun pa 'bul ba gcig dang gnyis dang rab tu mang po rnams kyi yang rung ste/_
[\[206a.5\]]dge 'dun gyi nang du ji snyed kyi ming dag brjod par nus pa'i bar dag gi 'dun [#]pa blang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_dge skos kyis [#]gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang zhing /_ma lhags pa dngos su yong dam glo bur du 'ongs pa la sogs pa yod par
[\[206a.6\]]'phrigs na gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad las kyi gnas su tshogs pas dge slong 'dun pa len pa chos lnga dang ldan pa gcig gam gnyis sam gsum tshig gis bsko bar bya zhing /_des btsal ba dang /_bod pa dang mthon por [#]'dug ste/_phyogs su lta ba la sogs pa
[\[206a.7\]]dag gis bsam pa thag pa nas mtshams kyi nang btsal te/_ma lhags pa rnams la deng dge 'dun gyi [#]gso sbyong mdzad pa la tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa 'bul lam zhes dri bar bya zhing /_ma lhags pa rnams kyis de la 'dun pa dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong 'dun pa la 'bul [#]bar byed pa'i
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_rgan pa la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_
[\[206b.2\]]deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad
[\[206b.3\]]pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod par [#]yang rig par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge slong 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas gal te de skad brjod mi nus na/_lus sam/_ngag gam/_lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis
[\[206b.4\]]'dun pa 'bul bar byed na 'dun pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/lus[#] sam/_ngag gam/_lus dang [#]ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis 'dun pa 'bul bar byed mi nus dge 'dun thams cad der 'dong zhing gso sbyong byas pa'am/[ #]yang na dge slong de dge 'dun gyi nang du bdas de [#]gso sbyong
[\[206b.5\]]bya'o/_/dge slong 'dun pa len pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong 'dun pa len pas 'dun pa blangs nas brgyug par mi bya/_mgyogs par mi bya/_mchong bar mi bya/_phyi rol la mchong bar mi bya/_'obs la mchong bar mi bya/_bang rim la mchong bar mi bya/_steng
[\[206b.6\]]gi nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis skas kyi rim pa gnyis la thod rgal du 'dzeg par mi bya/[ #]gom pa gcig gis them skas kyi them pa gnyis la [#]'dzeg par mi bya/_chu lkog ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya/_gnyid log
[\[206b.7\]]par mi bya/_snyoms par 'jug par mi bya bar dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]ma lhags pa rnams kyis 'dun pa brjod cig_/brjod pa yang rig par gyis shig ces smras pa'i tshe des dge slong ma yang na dge 'dun la
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]de'i[#] 'dun pa dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong la 'dun pa [#]'bul na ni des dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i mdun du [#]'dug ste/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas
[\[207a.2\]]ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba deng [#]dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/
[\[207a.3\]]'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun la 'dun pa [#]'bul na ni des dge 'dun gyi [#]dbus su rgan pa'i mthar 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[207a.4\]]dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che
[\[207a.5\]]ba ming 'di zhes bgyid de/[ #]dge 'dun chos bzhin [#]mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod par [#]yang rig par bgyid do zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong 'dun pa len pas 'dun pa blangs te dge 'dun gyi nang du ma byin [#]pa de nyid dam lam khar rgyun chad
[\[207a.6\]]cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na 'dun pa [#]ma blangs pa yin te yang blang bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du phyin nas rgyun chad cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na ma brjod kyang 'dun pa blangs pa yin te yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/de ni
[\[207a.7\]]dge 'dun dang mthun [#]par bya ba'i phyir dge slong gi 'dun pa dbul [#]ba'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun [#]pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs nas [#]gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la mtshams kyi nang na dge slong na ba dang /_dbang med pa dang /_srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]bar chad kyi rkyen gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su 'du bar mi nus pa yod na de bdag nyid yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dge 'dun dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de'i yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa cig car blang du yang rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong yongs su dag pa
[\[207b.2\]]dang /_'dun pa len pa gcig gis/_yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa 'bur ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_rab tu mang po rnams kyi yang rung ste/_dge 'dun gyi nang du ji snyed kyi ming dag brjod par nus pa'i bar dag gi yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa cig car blang bar bya'o/_/'di
[\[207b.3\]]ltar bya ste/_dge skos kyis [#]gso sbyong gi [#]tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang zhing ma lhags pa dngos su yod dam glo bur du 'ongs pa la sogs par yod par 'phrigs na gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad las kyi gnas su tshogs pas dge slong yongs su dag pa
[\[207b.4\]]dang 'dun pa len pa chos lnga dang ldan pa gcig gam gnyis sam gsum tshig gis bsko bar bya zhing des btsal ba dang bod pa dang mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su lta ba la sogs pa dag gis bsam pa thag pa nas mtshams kyi nang btsal te/_ma lhags pa rnams la deng dge 'dun
[\[207b.5\]]gso sbyong mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa bar chad kyi [#]chos rnams yongs su dag gam/_'dun pa 'bul lam zhes dri bar bya zhing ma lhags pa rnams kyis de la yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos
[\[207b.6\]]ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge slong [#]yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_
[\[207b.7\]]deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga ba lags te/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dag go zhes bdag nyid mchi'o/_/dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/bdag gi gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go/_/'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_
[\[208a.2\]]dge slong yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa 'bul bar byed pas gal te de skad brjod mi nus na lus sam/_ngag gam/_lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa 'bul bar byed na yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/lus sam ngag gi rnam
[\[208a.3\]]par rig byed kyis yongs su dag pa dang [#]'bul bar byed mi nus na dge 'dun thams cad der 'dong zhing gso sbyong bya ba'am/_yang na dge slong de dge 'dun gyi nang du blangs te gso sbyong bya'o/_/dge slong yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa len pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge
[\[208a.4\]]slong yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa [#]len pas yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa blangs nas brgyug [#]par mi bya/_mgyogs par mi bya/_mchong bar mi bya/_phyi rol la mchong bar mi bya/[ #]'obs la mchong bar mi bya/_bang rim la mchong [#]bar mi bya/[ #]steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug par mi
[\[208a.5\]]bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis skas kyi rim pa gnyis la thod rgal du 'dzeg par mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis them skas kyi them pa gnyis la thod rgal du 'dzeg par mi bya/_chu lkog [#]ma nub tsam la 'bog par mi bya/_gnyid log par mi bya/_snyoms
[\[208a.6\]]par 'jug par mi bya bar dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing /_gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag ma lhags pa rnams kyi [#]yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa [#]brjod cig_/brjod pa yang rig par gyis shig ces smras pa'i tshe des dge slong ma yang na [#]dge 'dun la
[\[208a.7\]]de'i yongs su dag pa dang [#]'dun pa cig car [#]dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong la 'bul na ni dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de [#]bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[208b.2\]]chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/de'i gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go/_/'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun la 'bum na ni des dge 'dun gyi dbus su rgan
[\[208b.3\]]pa'i mthar 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes
[\[208b.4\]]bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi'o/_/dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/
[\[208b.5\]]de'i gso sbyong yang yongs su dag go/_/'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa len pas yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa blangs te dge 'dun gyi nang du ma phyin par
[\[208b.6\]]de nyid dam lam khar rgyun chad [#]cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa ma blangs pa yin te yang blang bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du phyin nas rgyun chad cing dus byed dam khyim pa nyid la sogs par khas 'che bar byed na ma
[\[208b.7\]]brjod kyang yongs su dag pa dang 'dun [#]pa blangs pa yin te yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/de ni dge slong bdag nyid yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /[ #]mthun par bya ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa dang 'dun pa cig car dbul ba'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs nas dge slong smyos pa mi mthun pa [#]byed pa la smyos pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge
[\[209a.2\]]'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_/dge slong bye ma skyes 'di sgren mor byung nas smyos shing sems
[\[209a.3\]]'khrugs te/_de dang der 'khyam zhing dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi [#]gnas su res 'ga' ni mchi/[ #]res 'ga' ni mi mchi/_dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong [#]res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar bgyid/_res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar mi bgyid/_dge 'dun gyi ched
[\[209a.4\]]dang bgyi ba rnams la res 'ga' ni mchi/_res 'ga' ni mi mchi/_dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi ched dang bgyi ba rnams res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar bgyid/_res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar mi bgyid pas dge slong rnams bdag cag ni mthun par [#]ma gyur ces las
[\[209a.5\]]rnams mi bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa la [#]smyos pa'i gnang ba stsal zhig [#]gal te tshur mchi yang bzlog par mi bgyid/_phar mchi yang bzlog par mi bgyi bar dge
[\[209a.6\]]slong bye ma skyes tshur mchi'am phar mchi yang rung /_dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bgyi ste/_des dge 'dun mi mthun par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar
[\[209a.7\]]bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong bye ma skyes 'di sgren mor byung nas smyos shing [#]sems 'khrugs te de dang der 'khyam zhing /_dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su res 'ga' ni mchi/_res 'ga' ni mi mchi/_dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong res 'ga' ni
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]nyams su myong bar bgyid/_res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar mi bgyid/_dge 'dun dang [#]dge 'dun gyi ched dang bgyi ba rnams la res 'ga' ni mchi/_res 'ga' ni mi mchi/_dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi ched dang bgyi ba rnams la res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar
[\[209b.2\]]bgyid/_res 'ga' ni nyams su myong bar mi bgyid pas dge slong rnams/_bdag cag ni mthun par ma gyur ces las rnams mi bgyid na/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa la smyos pa'i gnang ba stsal zhing /[ #]gal te tshur mchi yang bzlog par mi bgyi/[ #]phar mchi
[\[209b.3\]]yang bzlog par mi bgyi bar/_dge slong bye ma skyes tshur mchi'am/_phar mchi yang rung /_dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang [#]bzhi'i las bgyi ste/_des dge 'dun mi mthun par mi 'gyur bar mdzad
[\[209b.4\]]na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa la smyos pa'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa [#]la smyos pa'i gnang ba stsal
[\[209b.5\]]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de [#]de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de ni smyos pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa 'ga' zhig rgyal po la sogs pas bzung ste/_mtshams kyi nang na 'dug na pho nya btang ba la sogs
[\[209b.6\]]pas de dang mthun pa sgrub [#]pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ba dang /_dge slong glo [#]bur du 'ongs pa 'ga' zhig mtshams kyi nang na 'dug par 'phrigs na btsal ba dang /_bong ba dang /_mthon por 'dug ste phyogs su lta ba dag gis de dang mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ba dang /_mtshams
[\[209b.7\]]gcig gi nang du tshogs tha dad pas las tha dad pa mang po so so na byed na 'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa phan tshun dbul ba dag gis de dang mthun pa sgrub pa'i phyir 'bad [#]par bya'o/_/de ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong la tshogs par bya ba'i cho ga'o/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]cho ga'i skabs nas/_gso sbyong gi gnas su 'du ba'i mdun rol kho nar gso sbyong snga ma 'das pa'i mtha' tshun chad kyi zla ba phyed kyi ltung ba la so sor brtag cing ltung ba shes pa bshags pa'am/_bsdam pa'am/_byin gyis brlabs [#]pas phyir bcos te las kyi
[\[210a.2\]]gnas[#] su 'dug par bya'o zhes sungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gso sbyong zhes bya ba ni bslab pa gsum po dag gso zhing sbyong bar byed pa ste/_de yang rnam pa gnyis ste/_mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang /_zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong ngo /_/de la mthun pa'i gso sbyong ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi
[\[210a.3\]]dbang du byas te gnas dang tshogs pa dang cho ga mthun par bya ba'o/_/zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong ni lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi dbang du byas te spong ba'i yan lag sgom [#]pa'o/_/de yang las phyi ma rnams ni mi bya ba'i chu lon gyis bsdam pa yin pas de ni mthun pa'i gso
[\[210a.4\]]sbyong gis sdom par byed do/_/las snga ma rnams ni bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyang ba yin pas de ni zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong gis sbyong bar byed de/_des na lhag pa'i tshul khrims la brten te lhag pa'i sems bskyed [#]la/_lhag pa'i sems la brten te lhag pa'i shes rab skye bas bslab pa
[\[210a.5\]]gsum po [#]dag gso zhing sbyong ba [#]ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang zhi gnas kyi gso sbyong yin par shes par bya'o/_/skabs 'dir ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong gzung bar [#]bya ste/_mthun pa'i gso sbyong ni rnam pa lnga ste/_bcu bzhi pa dang /_bco lnga ba dang /_bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang /_gnod pa
[\[210a.6\]]byung ba'i gso sbyong dang /_bsdum pa'i gso sbyong ngo /_/de la gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa dang /_bco lnga pa ni dus tshigs drug po [#]dag gis zla ba bcu gnyis la gso sbyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa las drug ni gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yin la/_bco brgyad ni gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin te/_dbyar zla gsum
[\[210a.7\]]dang /_dgun zla gsum gyi ni ra ba dang /_tha chungs mar gyi ngo bco lnga mi thub [#]pas ra ba dang tha chungs kyi gnam stong bzhi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yin la/_ston zla gsum dang dpyid zla gsum gyi [#]'bring por mar gyi ngo bco lnga mi thub pas 'bring po'i gnam stong gnyis gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa yin no/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]lhag ma bco brgyad ni gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin no/_/de dag brtsi ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba ngo re zhing smyug ma'i thur ma bco lnga skud pa la brgyus pa nyi ma re re bgrang [#]zhing dge skos kyis [#]gnas brtan la brtags te dge 'dun la nyi ma re zhing brjod par bya'o/_/zla ba shol dor ba ni
[\[210b.2\]]rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas dor ro/_/rgyu skar ni skar mkhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas shes par bya'o/_/bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang /_gnod pa byung ba'i gso sbyong dang /_bsdum pa'i gso sbyong dag ni/_gang gi tshe de dag bya dgos pa de'i tshe bya bar zad kyi dus nges pa ni med do/_/'di la [#]dge slong
[\[210b.3\]]thams cad kyis gso sbyong gi gnas su 'du ba'i mdun rol kho nar gso sbyong [#]ma 'das pa'i mtha' tshud chad kyi zla ba phyed kyi ltung ba la so sor brtag par bya ste/_ltung ba shes pa bshags [#]pa'am/_bsdams pa'am/_byin gyis brlabs pas phyir bcos te las kyi gnas su 'dug par bya'o/_/
[\[210b.4\]]de'i[#] cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste/_ltung byed 'ba' zhig gam/_so sor bshags par bya ba'am/_bshags par bya ba'i nyes byas las gang yang rung ba zhig shes na/_des mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_dge slong ltung ba mi mthun pa gcig gi mdun
[\[210b.5\]]du rgan pa la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ltung ba de dag pa'i mtha' tshun cad
[\[210b.6\]]nas[#] bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol lo/_/'chags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_/mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/_ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_len pas ltung ba mthong ngam [#]zhes brjod
[\[210b.7\]]par bya'o/_/'chags pas mthong ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/len pas phyin chad sdom mam zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'chags pas sdom mo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_len pas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'chags [#]pas legs so zhes
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]brjod par bya'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong ltung ba la dogs pa dang /_yid gnyis za bar gyur na dge slong des dge slong [#]mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa dag la dris te ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal nas dge slong gi mdun du
[\[211a.2\]]chos bzhin du phyir bya'o/_/bsdam par bya ba'i nyes byas gang yang rung ba zhig shes na rang gi sems kyis bsdam par bya'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma dang nyes pa sbom po dang spang pa'i ltung byed kyi ltung ba gang yang rung ba [#]zhig shes na byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/[ #]des snga ma bzhin
[\[211a.3\]]du mchil lham gnyis phud nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_dge slong ltung ba mi mthun pa gcig gi mdun du rgan pa la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di
[\[211a.4\]]zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas deng ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bgyi'o/_/sang nang par ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_de ni gso sbyong gi
[\[211a.5\]]gnas[#] su 'du ba'i mdun rol du ltung ba shes pa dang /_yid gnyis za ba dang /_bshags pa dang /_bsdam [#]pa dang /_byin gyis brlab [#]pa'i cho ga dang sngags [#]so/_/mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs nas/_gsol ba byas te so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas gso sbyong bya'o zhes gsungs pa
[\[211a.6\]]ni 'di ltar bya ste/_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon [#]pa ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi las yin no/_/des mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i las yin no/_/des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na gsum pa'i las yin no/_/des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na thams cad kyis res kyis gdon par bya'o/_/
[\[211a.7\]]res 'bab pa'i tshe des 'don mi nus na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o/_/des ma btub na dge 'dun gyis de la bcol bar bya'o/_/'don pa de dag gis tshig phyed kyang ma 'khrul par legs par thon pa de nyid yin na gdon gyi gzhan du na mi 'chags [#]so/_/'don pa'i tshe rdugs na lhag ma gzhan gyis
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]gdon par bya'o/_/dum bu [#]'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis gzhung bsrangs pa de snyed kyis pheg [#]tu phyed du bcad de gdon [#]par bya'o/_/'don par byed pas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_mdo 'don pa seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa
[\[211b.2\]]dang /_dus dang por bya ba dag je bton nas/_de'i 'og tu gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_seng ge'i khri la 'dug bzhin du 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa'am/_bco
[\[211b.3\]]lnga pa ste/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig [#]dang /_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong mdzad de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ltar gsol ba byas nas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa rnam pa lnga po gleng gzhi
[\[211b.4\]]gdon pa dang /[ #]pham par [#]gyur pa gdon pa dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa dang /_ma nges pa gdon pa dang /_ril gyis gdon pa dag gdon par bya'o/_/de la gleng gzhi gdon pa ni rdzogs pa kho nar mi gdon du mi rung ngo /_/gleng gzhi bton nas lhag ma rnams ni thos pa
[\[211b.5\]]bsgrags pas sgrub tu rung ngo /_/de yang gleng gzhi bton nas pham par 'gyur ba gdon pa brtsams na pham par 'gyur ba'i sde tshan rdzogs par gdon dgos so/_/pham par 'gyur ba bton nas dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa brtsams na dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan yang rdzogs par
[\[211b.6\]]gdon dgos so/_/dge 'dun lhag ma bton [#]nas ma nges pa gdon pa brtsams nas [#]ma nges pa'i sde tshan yang rdzogs par gdon dgos te/_pham par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma dang /_ma nges pa yan chad kyi sde tshan ni gdon par mgo brtsams na gang brtsams pa'i sde tshan de
[\[211b.7\]]nyid rdzogs par bya dgos so/_/spang ba'i ltung byed man chad kyi sde tshan ni gdon par mgo brtsams na lhag ma so sor thar pa'i gzhung thams cad rdzogs par gdon dgos te/_ril gyis gdon pa zhes bya ba yang de yin no/_/mgo brtsams [#]pa'i sde tshan de nyid rdzogs par bya dgos pa de dag
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ma rdzogs na mi 'chags so/_/'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dron lam du 'gro la 'dron pa don mthun pa dag sdod du mi btub na 'gro bzhin du gdon par bya ste/_'di'i las ni [#]'dug pa nyid kyis bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i dmigs kyis bsal [#]ba yin no/_/sgra mi
[\[212a.2\]]'dod na mdor bsdus [#]te gdon no/[ #]/de tsam yang mi 'dod na byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o/_/chos ma yin pas [#]'don na mi 'chags te/_gdon par bya ba dang /_de'i tshad dang /_dus dang /_gdon par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin pa'o/_/gdon par
[\[212a.3\]]bya ba de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni so sor thar pa'i mdo las gzhan pa phran tshegs la sogs pa gdon pa'o/_/de'i tshad de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni gleng gzhi [#]mi 'don zhing lhag ma rnams kyang thos pa bsgrags pas sgrub par mi byed pa'o/_/de'i dus de kho na bzhin nye bar
[\[212a.4\]]ma [#]bzung ba ni gso sbyong gi dus las gzhan pa'i dus su 'don pa'o/_/'don par byed pa de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni gang zag bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang mtshan dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dang lta ba [#]mthun pa dag las gzhan pas 'don [#]pa'o/_/de ni so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i cho ga dang
[\[212a.5\]]las so/_/mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gis [#]dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran na des ltung ba de dge slong drung na mo la byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i mdun du tsog tsog
[\[212a.6\]]pur 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i [#]gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge
[\[212a.7\]]'dun gyi nang du ltung [#]ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig dran te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba deng ltung ba 'di tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bgyi'o/_/sang nang par ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi'o zhes lan cig [#]brjod par bya'o/_de ni dge slong gis dge
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]'dun gyi nang du ltung ba [#]dran pa byin gyis brlab [#]pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/_des ltung ba de dge slong drung na mo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa
[\[212b.2\]]ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des [#]dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong yang
[\[212b.3\]]bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig la yid gnyis su gyur na bdag gis deng ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bgyi'o/_/sang nang par dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul
[\[212b.4\]]ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi'o zhes lan cig [#]brjod par bya'o/_/de ni dge slong dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/
[\[212b.5\]]de nyid kyi [#]skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong las byed pa dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran na ltung ba de rang gi [#]sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des 'dug bzhin du sems kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/deng dge 'dun gyi
[\[212b.6\]]gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/_bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin te/_bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig dran te/_bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya bas deng ltung
[\[212b.7\]]ba de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o/_/sang nang par ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir bya'o zhes lan cig [#]brjod par bya'o/_/de ni las byed pa'i [#]dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba dran pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]nyid [#]dge slong las byed pas dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na des ltung ba de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des 'dug bzhin sems kyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/deng dge
[\[213a.2\]]'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/_bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin te/_bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig la yid gnyis su gyur na bdag dge slong las byed pa ming 'di zhes
[\[213a.3\]]bya bas deng ltung ba de rang gi [#]sems kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o/_/sang nang par dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin phyir bya'o zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[213a.4\]]de ni las byed pa dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung [#]ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i [#]cho ga dang sngags so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba [#]mthun pa dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de rnams kyis gang gi mdun du de
[\[213a.5\]]rnams ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir bya ba'i dge slong 'ga' zhig gnas gzhan du song la dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byed pa de lta bu spro bar bya'o/_/gal te 'grub na de lta na legs ci ste mi 'grub na dge slong de rnams kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis byin
[\[213a.6\]]gyis brlab par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gal te gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad kyi ltung ba mthun pa dang bcas par shes par gyur na dge slong gcig mtshams gzhan gyi dge slong gi drung du btang ste/_des der ltung ba dran pa [#]phyir bcos [#]phyir 'ongs nas
[\[213a.7\]]de'i mdun du thams cad kyis ltung ba shes pa phyir bcos te gso sbyong bya'o/_/gal te cho ga de ma grub na dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis [#]byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa [#]rnams gsan
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na/_gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/_dge slong gi mdun
[\[213b.2\]]du ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma [#]mchis na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de chos
[\[213b.3\]]bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad kyis ltung ba mthun par [#]shes pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang las so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par
[\[213b.4\]]gyur na dge slong de rnams kyis gang gi mdun du de rnams ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir bya ba'i dge slong 'ga' zhig gnas gzhan du song la/_dge slong mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te ltung ba la yid gnyis bsal nas chos bzhin du phyir byed pa de lta bu
[\[213b.5\]]spro bar bya'o/_/gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/_ci ste mi 'grub na dge slong de rnams kyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gal de gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la [#]yid gnyis dang bcas par
[\[213b.6\]]gyur na dge slong zhig mtshams gzhan gyi dge slong mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyi drung du btang ste/_des der ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal te phyir 'ongs nas de'i mdun du thams cad kyis ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur pa bsal [#]te gso sbyong
[\[213b.7\]]bya'o/_gal te cho ga de ma grub na dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las kyis byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi [#]gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]cag dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/_gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi [#]ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/_dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin
[\[214a.2\]]pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/_
[\[214a.3\]]slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la yid gnyis dang bcas par [#]gyur pa byin gyis
[\[214a.4\]]brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags [#]so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge
[\[214a.5\]]slong gnyug mar gnas pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de/_dge slong gtam 'dres pa dang /_phebs par smra ba dang /_smos [#]'drin dang /_'grogs bshes gang yin pa de'i drung du song ste/_ci nas kyang dge slong [#]dge slong gzhan
[\[214a.6\]]dag kyang ltung ba 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar gleng ba dang dran par bya'o/_/gal te 'grub na de ltar na legs/_ci ste mi 'grub cing dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na/_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/'di
[\[214a.7\]]ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba'i slad du rtsod par gyur na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba'i slad du rtsod pa de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis la/_ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni
[\[214b.2\]]gsol ba'o/_/de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/de nyid kyi skabs nas gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la nges pa [#]nyid ma yin par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis [#]byin gyis
[\[214b.3\]]brlabs te gso sbyong bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na dge slong de/_dge slong gtam 'dres pa dang /_phebs par smra ba dang /_smos 'drin dang /_
[\[214b.4\]]'grogs bshes gang yin pa de'i drung du song ste/_ci nas kyang dge slong gzhan dag kyang ltung ba 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar gleng ba dang dran par bya'o/_/gal te 'grub na de lta na legs ci ste mi 'grub cing dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur na dge slong
[\[214b.5\]]gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las kyis [#]byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba
[\[214b.6\]]nges pa nyid ma lags par gyur na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng [#]ltung ba nges pa nyid ma lags pa de byin gyis brlabs te gso sbyong mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa
[\[214b.7\]]dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te nges pa nyid ma lags pa bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de ni gso sbyong gi dus su dge 'dun ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma yin par gyur pa byin gyis brlab [#]pa'i cho ga dang sngags so/_/mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi/_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]cho ga'i skabs de nyid nas gnas gang na dge slong bzhi bas nyung ba gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_des gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/_phyag dar bya/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pas byug
[\[215a.2\]]par bya/_seng ge'i khri bsham par bya/_stan bsham par bya/_mar me gzugs par bya/_chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyogs ches mthon por 'dug ste phyogs bzhir blta bar bya'o/_/der dge slong yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa la la dag 'ong na 'di skad ces kye tshe
[\[215a.3\]]dang ldan pa dag myur ba myur bar shog shig_/deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing /_de dag dang lhan cig 'dug ste gso sbyong bya'o/_/gal te 'grub na de lta na legs/_ci ste mi 'grub na dge slong des byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_des
[\[215a.4\]]rang gi stan la 'dug ste 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o/_/deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag
[\[215a.5\]]go zhes kyang bdag smra/_bdag yongs su dag par lha rnams kyis gzung du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir deng gso sbyong byin gyis brlab bo/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan
[\[215a.6\]]cig tu [#]gso sbyong rgya cher nyams su myong bar bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa [#]gdon par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_gang na dge slong gnyis 'khod pa der ni rim pa de bzhin du bya zhing dus kyi bar du bsdad de/_ma grub na mdun du tsog [#]pur 'dug ste
[\[215a.7\]]gcig la gcig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa'am tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng [#]dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]bar chad kyi
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes bdag mchi/_bdag yongs su dag par btsun pa'am tshe dang ldan pas gzung [#]du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng gso sbyong byin gyis brlab bo/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun
[\[215b.2\]]tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong rgya cher nyams su myong bar bgyi zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa gdon par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_gang na dge slong gsum 'khod pa der ni rim pa de bzhin du [#]bya zhing dus kyi bar du bsdad
[\[215b.3\]]de/_ma grub na rgan rims bzhin gral du 'khod de rim gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags snga ma nyid brjod par bya'o/_/gang na dge slong bzhi 'khod pa der ni de rnams kyis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing der nad pa'i yongs su dag pa ni blang bar mi bya'o/_/gang du dge slong lnga'am
[\[215b.4\]]lhag pa 'khod pa der ni de rnams kyis gsol ba byas te/_gso sbyong bya zhing der ni nad pa'i yongs su dag pa yang blang bar bya'o/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so//_//dbyar[#] dang de dang nye ba'i gzhi dgag dbye'i gzhi'i sdom la/_gnas
[\[215b.5\]]mal dang ni tshul shing dang /_/snga ma phyi ma zhag bdun dang /_/bzhi bcu dgag dbye gsol ba dang /_/bdag dang go bar bya ba'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di
[\[215b.6\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs pa [#]la spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod [#]cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bskos te/_dge slong gnas mal stobs pa ming 'di
[\[215b.7\]]zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs so/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bsko na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun
[\[216a.2\]]gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du [#]'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po tshes [#]bco lnga lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi
[\[216a.3\]]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng tshul shing bzhes te sang nang par gnas par khas blang ngo /_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dbyar phyi ma la ni dbyar nye bar bsgrub [#]pa dbyar zla tha chungs tshes bco lnga lags na zhes sngags kyi bye brag tu
[\[216a.4\]]bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir 'di lta ste/_gnas ral ba dang /_'drums [#]pa bcos pa'i slad du sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang /_zhal ta pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang /_spyod yul gyi
[\[216a.5\]]grong che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_bro g.yog che ge mo zhes bgyi bas dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par khas blang ngo /_/bdag dbyar 'di na [#]mchis shing bdag gi dbyar gyi gnas ni 'di lags so/_/dbyar phyi ma la ni dbyar phyi ma zla ba gsum gnas par khas blang ngo zhes sngags
[\[216a.6\]]kyis bye brag tu bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma [#]zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa las bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/_bgyi ba zhig gi slad du dgung bdun mtshams kyi slad
[\[216a.7\]]rol du mchi ba dang /_deng tshun chad kyi slar [#]mchi bar byin gyis brlab bo/_/bdag dbyar 'di na mchis shing bdag [#]dbyar gyi gnas ni 'di lags so/_/dbyar gyi gzhi'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa khyod zhag bzhi bcu byin gyis brlabs te dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'gro bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs te/_bdag dbyar 'di na mchis shing bdag gi dbyar gyi gnas ni 'di lags
[\[216b.2\]]pa las/[ #]bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhag bzhi bcu byin gyis brlabs [#]te/_dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang /_de tshun chad kyis slar mchi bar spro na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ming
[\[216b.3\]]'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/[ #]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'di'i [#]dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum du gnas par khas blangs te/_'di
[\[216b.4\]]dbyar 'di na mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi gnas 'di lags pa las dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi ched [#]la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang de tshun chad kyis slar mchi bar dge 'dun las zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis [#]dus la bab cing
[\[216b.5\]]bzod[#] na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba mdzod cig dang /_'di dbyar 'di na mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi gnas 'di lags pa las dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams [(]gyi [,]kyi[)]slad rol du mchi ba dang /_de [#]tshun chad slar mchi bar dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis zhag bzhi bcu'i
[\[216b.6\]]gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs te/_'di dbyar 'di na mchis shing 'di'i dbyar gyi
[\[216b.7\]]gnas 'di lags pa las/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang de tshun chad kyis las mchi bar [#]dge 'dun la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba gsol te/_de'i slad du 'di dbyar 'di na mchis shing de'i [#]dbyar gyi gnas 'di
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]lags pa las/_dge 'dun gyi ched la mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi ba dang /_de tshun chad kyis slar mchi bar dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba gsol na/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang
[\[217a.2\]]ba stsal bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la zhag bzhi bcu'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung
[\[217a.3\]]bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dbyar dang nye ba'i gzhi'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge
[\[217a.4\]]slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/dgag dbye yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/lan gsum du
[\[217a.5\]]bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun [#]dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro
[\[217a.6\]]'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dag [#]la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyi [#]dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/dgag dbye yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/lan gsum du [#]bzlas/_
[\[217a.7\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun kyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/dgag dbye yang brjod do/_/brjod pa [#]yang rig par bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge
[\[217b.2\]]'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la
[\[217b.3\]]'dun pa 'bul lo/_/'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/lan gsum du [#]bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming
[\[217b.4\]]'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal [#]ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par
[\[217b.5\]]bgyid do/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_
[\[217b.6\]]gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/'dun pa yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyi'o/[ #]/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun
[\[217b.7\]]gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i [#]dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun chos bzhin du
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]mdzad pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo/_/bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs [#]pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/'dun pa dang dgag dbye yang brjod [#]do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/lan gsum du
[\[218a.2\]]bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba
[\[218a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun pa [#]'bul lo/_/bdag [#]la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/'dun pa dang dgag dbye yang brjod do/_/
[\[218a.4\]]brjod pa yang rig par [#]bgyid do/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang
[\[218a.5\]]bco lnga pa lags te/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba sdug bsngal ba bro tshabs che ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun chos bzhin du mdzad pa la 'dun [#]pa 'bul lo/_/bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis [#]dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun
[\[218a.6\]]la dgag dbye bgyid do/_/'dun pa dang dgag dbye yang brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
[\[218a.7\]]dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bsko ste/_dge
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]slong dgag dbye bgyid pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la [#]dgag dbye bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par
[\[218b.2\]]spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bsko [#]na/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bsko bar/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang
[\[218b.3\]]ma gsungs shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bar [#]dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/
[\[218b.4\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng [#]dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba mdzod cig dang /_deng dge 'dun dgag dbye mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[218b.5\]]gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na/_gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag la dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/_dge slong gi mdun du
[\[218b.6\]]ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de chos bzhin
[\[218b.7\]]du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba la dogs pa dang yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na/_gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bzhin du slar bgyi ba bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la/_dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa [#]dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma mchis na
[\[219a.2\]]gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis [#]gnang ba mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dang [#]ltung ba de byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te dogs pa dang yid gnyis
[\[219a.3\]]bsal la/_ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba'i slad du rtsod par gyur pa [#]na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus
[\[219a.4\]]la[#] bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba'i slad du rtsod pa [#]byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis la
[\[219a.5\]]ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa la/_bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma lags par gyur na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la
[\[219a.6\]]bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis deng ltung ba la nges pa nyid ma lags pa de byin gyis brlabs te dgag dbye mdzad la/_slad kyi [#]dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris te nges pa nyid ma
[\[219a.7\]]lags pa bsal la ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags na/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]bgyi ba bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag la gdams su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag la rjes su bstan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis
[\[219b.2\]]bdag la rjes su gzung du gsol/_thugs brtse ba can tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_ltung ba shes shing mthong na chos bzhin 'dul ba bzhin du slar bgyi'o/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/
[\[219b.3\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'di na dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad lags so/_/legs par dgag dbye mdzad do/_/shin tu dgag dbye mdzad do/_/btsun pa rdzas 'di lta bus kyang dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
[\[219b.4\]]la dgag dbye bgyir rung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu dge tshul rnams la dgag dbye bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong [#]rnams la'o/_/dge slong bzhi man chad kyis ni byin gyis brlab [#]par bya'o/_/deng dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dgag
[\[219b.5\]]dbye[#] yang bco lnga pa yin te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas [#]dgag dbye byin gyis brlab bo/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa de'i tshe bdag la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bya'o/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_
[\[219b.6\]]dgag dbye'i gzhi'o//_//bam po brgyad pa/_sra brkyang [#]gi gzhi'i sdom la/_sra brkyang gding bar byed pa dang /_/'ding dang go byed 'byin pa'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'di na dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis gos kyi rnyed pa'i chos
[\[219b.7\]]gos bgyis pa [#]'di dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du bzhed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du chos gos sra brkyang du bgyis te/_gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[220a.2\]]'di ltar gnas 'dir dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis [#]gos kyi [#]rnyed pa'i chos gos bgyis pa 'di dge 'dun gyis [#]sra brkyang du bzhes pas/_de'i slad du 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par
[\[220a.3\]]bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyis te/_gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos te/_chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa
[\[220a.4\]]de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar gnas
[\[220a.5\]]pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]sra brkyang 'ding bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
[\[220a.6\]]mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bsko ste/[ #]dge slong sra brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge
[\[220a.7\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong [#]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bsko ste/_dge slong sra
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]brkyang 'ding ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur na/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bsko bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de
[\[220b.2\]]dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bar [#]dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
[\[220b.3\]]gsol/_chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
[\[220b.4\]]mdzod cig dang /_'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du dge 'dun gyi [#]chos gos 'di sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtod cing sra
[\[220b.5\]]brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba chos gos 'dis dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi [#]sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur te/_gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang [#]mi 'bral na gsar [#]pa rnams dang lta ci smos/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa
[\[220b.6\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis [#]sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos lags te/_'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_sbyin
[\[220b.7\]]pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su dpyad pa'i [#]slad du bdag sra brkyang 'ding ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bgyi'o/_/gnas gang du sra brkyang bting [#]bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]smos/_lan gsum du bzlas/_gnas brtan [#]nam btsun pa'am tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du blo mthun par bgyis pa lags/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos pa lags te/_
[\[221a.2\]]de'i slad du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su spyad pa'i slad du bdag sra brkyang 'ding [#]ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags te/_
[\[221a.3\]]gnas gang du sra brkyang bting bar chos gos rnying pa rnams dang yang mi 'bral na gsar pa rnams dang lta ci smos/_lan gsum [#]bzlas/_legs par bting ngo /_/shin tu bting ngo /_/'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon gang yod pa de bdag gi yin no/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[221a.4\]]'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis [#]sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus rdzogs te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis [#]sra brkyang 'byin pa [#]mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge
[\[221a.5\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus rdzogs te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis [#]sra brkyang 'byin na/_sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/
[\[221a.6\]]gang dag mi bzod [#]pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[221a.7\]]gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags na gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_chom rkum gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te dge
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]'dun sra brkyang 'byin pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di [#]ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting ba las chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams lhags te/_de'i slad du chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong
[\[221b.2\]]rnams la brten nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'byin pa [#]mdzad na/_chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brten te sra brkyang 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_
[\[221b.3\]]de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas chom rkun gyis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la brtan [#]nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang phyung lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/sra brkyang gi gzhi'o//_//gos kyi
[\[221b.4\]]gzhi dang nye ba'i gos kyi gzhi'i sdom la/_shi dang nor 'dra snod 'gyid dang /_/bcu gsum dang ni rung bya ba/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
[\[221b.5\]]cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i rdzas bgo bar bgyi ba gum pa'i yo byad chos gos dang chos gos ma lags pa gda' ba dang mi gda' ba byin gyis brlab bo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di ltar gnas 'dir dge
[\[221b.6\]]slong gre skyes gum par gyur na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong kun dga' bo nor dang 'dra bas dge slong gre skyes gum pa'i rdzas bgo bar bgyi ba gum pa'i yo byad chos gos dang chos gos ma lags pa
[\[221b.7\]]gda' ba dang mi gda' ba byin gyis brlab bo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/gos kyi gzhi'o//_//ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par [#]spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad [#]'gyed par spro na/_gal
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par bsko ste/_dge slong snod spyad 'gyed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par 'gyur
[\[222a.2\]]ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i [#]dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par bsko ste/_dge slong snod spyad 'gyed pa ming 'di
[\[222a.3\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par 'gyur na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'gyed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_
[\[222a.4\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun [#]snod spyad 'gyed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du [#]'dzin to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos bgyis lags pa rung ba spyad par 'os pa'i chos
[\[222a.5\]]gos [#]snam sbyar du byin gyis brlab bo/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/de bzhin du bla gos dang /_mthang [#]gos dang /_sham thabs dang /_sham thabs kyi gzan dang rdul gzan dang /_rngul gzan gyi gzan dang /_gdong phyis dang /_rnag [#]gzan dang /_g.yan pa
[\[222a.6\]]dgab pa dang /_skra bzed dang /_gding ba dang /_dbyar gyi gos ras chen la yang brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_gos 'di bdag dang grogs tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mkho ba'i yo byad kyi [#]gos su byin gyis brlab bo/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs
[\[222a.7\]]yin no/_/legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos lhag pa rung bar ma bgyis pa rung bar bgyi bar [#]'os pa 'di mkhan po la rung bar bgyi'o/_/mkhan po la yid brtan te bcang bar bgyi'o/_/rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/_/lan
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/gos kyi gzhi dang /_nye ba'i gos kyi gzhi'o//_//sman gyi gzhi dang las kyi gzhi'i sdom la/_sman dang rung ba'i khang pa dang /_/'dun pa'i gso sbyong bya ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_/bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
[\[222b.2\]]ba'i[#] sman thun tshod du rung ba 'di dag bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs [#]par spyod pa rnams kyir bgyi bar thun tshod du rung bar byin gyis brlab bo/_/lan gsum [#]bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/zhag bdun pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dag la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong lag gi blas
[\[222b.3\]]rdo bteg pa na de'i dang por gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur ba'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya zhing tshig tu yang brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis sems bsdu bas tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur bar sems sdus [#]shig ces
[\[222b.4\]]sems bsdu bar bya'o/_/dge slong ji snyed der phyin pa thams cad kyis [#]gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes tshig mthun par [#]cig car brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang
[\[222b.5\]]mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bzhed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyi [#]gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol
[\[222b.6\]]nye 'khor 'dom gang [#]bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang [#]mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang [#]bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i
[\[222b.7\]]khang par bzhed de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyid [#]na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am bgyis pa 'am lags
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyi [#]gnas thams cad
[\[223a.2\]]grub pa'am bgyis pa'am lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i khang par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang [#]mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/sman gyi gzhi'o//_//'phags pa dgongs su gsol/_/rgyal po'i kun dga' ra
[\[223a.3\]]ba'i dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod pa nyung ngam/_nyam nga ba [#]chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba'am/[ #]kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam/_bde ba la
[\[223a.4\]]reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gsol lo/_/'dun pa dang gso sbyong bgyi bar gsol ba 'debs so/_/gsol ba yang mkhyen par gsol lo/_/las kyi gzhi'o//_//phyir bcos [#]pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/_gleng
[\[223a.5\]]dang nan tur bzod pa dang /_/mthol dang spo ba rnams dang ni/_/mgu dang dbyung bar bya ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod re lde ri la song ste/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la dge sbyong gi chos ma yin pa rnam pa mang pos gleng bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[223a.6\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde ri la song ste/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la dge sbyong gi chos ma lags pa mang pos gleng bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis
[\[223a.7\]]dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la gleng bar bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di re lde ri la mchis nas dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la dge sbyong [#]gi chos ma
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]lags pa [#]rnam mang pos gleng bar [#]spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la gleng bar bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la gleng bar bsko
[\[223b.2\]]ba [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong gleng ba po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la gleng bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de
[\[223b.3\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag [#]ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/[ #]rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags te/_de dag dge slong rnams la rgyun du rtsod pa'i gzhi
[\[223b.4\]]bskyed [#]pas des na [#]lung mnod pa dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton bgyid pa [#]dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar
[\[223b.5\]]ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs [#]pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di ni 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang [#]'bru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid
[\[223b.6\]]pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags te/_de dag dge slong rnams la rgyun tu rtsod pa'i gzhi skyed [#]pas/_des na dge 'dun lung mnod pa dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton bgyi ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor na/[ #]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
[\[223b.7\]]dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang [#]ma gsungs shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba rnams la bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di
[\[224a.2\]]ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong dmar ser can 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas/_dge 'dun gyis bdag la
[\[224a.3\]]bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs [#]par nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod
[\[224a.4\]]pa gsol zhing 'thab krol bgyid pa de yang spong na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bdag dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[224a.5\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can 'di 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis bsdigs pa'i [#]phrin las mdzad lags te/_
[\[224a.6\]]'di bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/[ #]skra 'phyar bar gyur cing /_dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing 'thab krol bgyid pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge
[\[224a.7\]]'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad [#]do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dmar ser can ming 'di
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di 'thab [#]krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa lags pas 'thab krol bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di bsdigs [#]pa'i phrin las mdzad
[\[224b.2\]]lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol [#]zhing 'thab krol bgyid pa de yang spong ste/_de'i slad du dge slong dmar ser can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
[\[224b.3\]]dge 'dun gyis bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag
[\[224b.4\]]ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du [#]lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dmar ser can bsdigs pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di
[\[224b.5\]]ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun tu bgyid pa 'di [#]dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de/_'di la dge 'dun gyis spo [#]ba dang /_gzhi nas spo [#]ba dang /_mgu bar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[224b.6\]]gzhi[#] nas [#]mgu bar bgyi ba stsol ba dang 'byin pa mdzad pas/_lung mnod pa dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton bgyi ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
[\[224b.7\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/[ #]dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun tu bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de/_
[\[225a\]]
