[\[225a.1\]]'di la dge 'dun gyis spo [#]ba dang gzhi nas spo [#]ba dang /_mgu bar bgyi ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsol ba dang 'byin pa mdzad pas lung mnod pa dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton bgyi ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su
[\[225a.2\]]bgyi ba shor te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad de/_bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa
[\[225a.3\]]de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
[\[225a.4\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du 'byin pa la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du 'byin pas bdag la dge 'dun gyis smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun tu
[\[225a.5\]]bgyid pa la [#]smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa de yang spong na/_
[\[225a.6\]]thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dge 'dun 'di ltung ba rgyun tu
[\[225a.7\]]bgyid de/_'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyis [#]pas 'di la dge 'dun gyis [#]spo ba dang /_gzhi nas spo [#]ba dang /_mgu bar bgyi [#]ba dang /_gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsol ba dang 'byin pa mdzad pas lung mnod pa dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton bgyi ba dang /_rnal
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]'byor dang /_yid la bgyi ba dang /_nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor te/_ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di la smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu
[\[225b.2\]]snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa de'ang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis
[\[225b.3\]]dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan [#]du gsol/_dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de/_ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa ma btang ba 'di la
[\[225b.4\]]dge 'dun gyis smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_dge slong dge ldan 'di smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod
[\[225b.5\]]pa gsol zhing ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_de'i slad du dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de
[\[225b.6\]]dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge ldan smad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad
[\[225b.7\]]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags te/_'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin par yang [#]snang zhing
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]thos la 'tshal/_'di gnyis sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis [#]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so khyim [#]sun 'byin pa ma
[\[226a.2\]]btang ba la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags te/_'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin par [#]yang snang zhing thos la
[\[226a.3\]]'tshal/_sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so khyim sun 'byin pa ma btang ba la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so la bskrad pa'i phrin las
[\[226a.4\]]mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang [#]nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so khyim sun 'byin pa
[\[226a.5\]]ma btang ba la bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de [#]de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags pas bdag cag la dge
[\[226a.6\]]'dun gyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing /[ #]dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la/_
[\[226a.7\]]mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de yang spong na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa lags te/_'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin par snang zhing thos la 'tshal/_'di
[\[226b.2\]]gnyis sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod par yang snang zhing thos la 'tshal te/_khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa ma btang ba 'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di gnyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_
[\[226b.3\]]skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na
[\[226b.4\]]dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad [#]lags pa la dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so 'di gnyis khyim sun
[\[226b.5\]]'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pas/_'di gnyis la dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_
[\[226b.6\]]mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchis pa la bzod pa mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad
[\[226b.7\]]par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shing /_/gang[#] dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab [#]so bskrad pa'i phrin las mdzad
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis
[\[227a.2\]]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed [#]pa'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid de/_de'i slad du
[\[227a.3\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod
[\[227a.4\]]pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi
[\[227a.5\]]gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pas bdag la dge 'dun gyis slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag dge slong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas
[\[227a.6\]]skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa de yang spong na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[227a.7\]]kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong dam pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa [#]de la dge 'dun gyis slar
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]'gyed [#]pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing khyim pa la brnyas
[\[227b.2\]]thabs bgyid pa de yang spong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la dge 'dun gyis bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[227b.3\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid [#]pas de la dge 'dun gyis slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_
[\[227b.4\]]mtshungs par nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa/_de'ang spong ngo zhes mchi ba la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dam pa slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de
[\[227b.5\]]dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa slar [#]'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod
[\[227b.6\]]pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_de la dge slong rnams kyis glengs shing [#]dran par bgyis [#]kyang ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab
[\[227b.7\]]cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzod do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_de la [#]dge slong
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rnams kyis glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes mchis te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa la [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
[\[228a.2\]]mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas
[\[228a.3\]]dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa la ltung ba byung bas dge 'dun gyis bdag 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags
[\[228a.4\]]te/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing
[\[228a.5\]]ltung ba de yang mthong [#]na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'dun pa la [#]ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[228a.6\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_ltung ba ma mthong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar
[\[228a.7\]]gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de yang mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_ltung ba ma mthong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas
[\[228b.2\]]dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du
[\[228b.3\]]mchis te bzod pa [#]gsol zhing ltung ba de yang [#]mthong ngo zhes mchi bas [#]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag [#]dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas
[\[228b.4\]]dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la [#]bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun
[\[228b.5\]]gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung yang de chos bzhin
[\[228b.6\]]du slar mi 'chos na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[228b.7\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di ltung ba byung yang de [#]chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos [#]pas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos [#]pa 'di la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]slar[#] mi 'chos [#]pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni [#]gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod
[\[229a.2\]]cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba byung [#]la ltung ba de chos
[\[229a.3\]]bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas/_bdag ltung ba slar mi 'chos [#]pa la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pa [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge
[\[229a.4\]]'dun la spu snyol par bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de yang chos bzhin du slar 'chos na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'dun pa
[\[229a.5\]]slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas 'di la dge
[\[229a.6\]]'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs
[\[229a.7\]]par nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol zhing ltung ba de [#]yang chos bzhin du slar 'chos so zhes mchi [#]na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste/_ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar mi 'chos pas 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin
[\[229b.2\]]las mdzad lags te/_dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos [#]pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/[ #]'byung bar bskyod/[ #]mtshungs par nye bar ston/[ #]mtshams kyi nang du mchis te
[\[229b.3\]]bzod pa gsol zhing slar 'chos so zhes mchis pas/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos [#]pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung
[\[229b.4\]]ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la [#]bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du [#]lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis
[\[229b.5\]]dge slong 'dun pa slar mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa
[\[229b.6\]]'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag brten [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams
[\[229b.7\]]te bsgo na/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo [#]yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]kyis bsgo na/_'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
[\[230a.2\]]bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las bgyis te/_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_
[\[230a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar [#]mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi
[\[230a.4\]]ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag [#]yin pa de dag brten [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes
[\[230a.5\]]mchi nas 'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo na/_'di la dge slong rab tu mang pos bzhams te bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_'di
[\[230a.6\]]la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/_'di la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo yang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas/_'di nyid bden gyis gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de'i
[\[230a.7\]]slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi ste/_ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad mi gtong ba de
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyid [#]na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi zhing ji srid du dge slong 'chi
[\[230b.2\]]ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i [#]rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad kyi [#]thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par bgyi zhing mchog tu smad par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang
[\[230b.3\]]ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis [#]bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung
[\[230b.4\]]ba'i phrin las mdzad cing ji srid du dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thams cad kyi thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi gtong ba de srid du gtam 'dre bar mi bgyi/_phebs par smra bar mi bgyi zhing /_dper na gdol bu bzhin du smad par
[\[230b.5\]]bgyis shing mchog tu smad par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'chi ltas [#]sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i
[\[230b.6\]]chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag brten [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchis pas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas [#]sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin
[\[230b.7\]]las mdzad cing smad lags te/_bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pas skra 'greng par gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]bar nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de yang gtong na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa btang lags
[\[231a.2\]]pa[#] la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di [#]la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de dag
[\[231a.3\]]brten [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas/_dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te/_dge
[\[231a.4\]]slong 'chi ltas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du 'chis te bzod pa gsol zhing sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam
[\[231a.5\]]pa de yang gtong ngo zhes mchi na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/_/
[\[231a.6\]]'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang dag [#]yin pa de dag brten [#]kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[231a.7\]]de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis shes so zhes mchi nas de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags te/_dge slong 'chi ltas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]mdzad cing smad lags pas 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de yang gtong ngo zhes mchi bas de'i slad du dge
[\[231b.2\]]'dun gyis [#]dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
[\[231b.3\]]mdzad cing smad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis
[\[231b.4\]]dge slong 'chi ltas sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad cing smad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[231b.5\]]bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ltung ba de dag pa'i mtha' tshun chad nas bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol lo/_/'chags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_/mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par [#]'gyur gyis
[\[231b.6\]]ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_ltung ba mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/phyin chad sdom mam/_sdom mo/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las
[\[231b.7\]]byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs pas bdag dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun la [#]zla ba phyed spo ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag
[\[232a.2\]]dge[#] slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs te/_dge slong 'char ka 'di che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs la [#]de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun
[\[232a.3\]]gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[232a.4\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs te/_dge slong 'char ka 'di [#]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun la zla ba phyed spo ba gsol te/_
[\[232a.5\]]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba
[\[232a.6\]]phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun
[\[232a.7\]]gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ste/_bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs
[\[232b.2\]]brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung
[\[232b.3\]]ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_dge slong 'char ka 'di che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing [#]bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_
[\[232b.4\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i [#]slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba [#]stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun
[\[232b.5\]]lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_dge slong 'char ka 'di che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung
[\[232b.6\]]ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag
[\[232b.7\]]ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis [#]bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pas/_bdag dge slong 'char ka dge
[\[233a.2\]]'dun gyi gan du mchis te che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol nas/[ #]dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed
[\[233a.3\]]bcabs pa de'i slad du [#]zla ba phyed spo ba stsal te/_bdag spo ba bgyid bzhin pa las dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pas/_bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun
[\[233a.4\]]las gzhi nas spo ba yang gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas spo ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum bzlas/_
[\[233a.5\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pas dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi [#]gan du mchis te/_che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs
[\[233a.6\]]pa de'i slad du dge 'dun la zla ba phyed spo ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal te 'di spo ba bgyid bzhin pa las/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung
[\[233a.7\]]ba snga ma dang [#]'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pas/_de'i slad du/[ #]dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas spo ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas spo ba yang stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun [#]pa rnams gsan
[\[233b.2\]]du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba zla ba [#]phyed bcabs pas/_dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge
[\[233b.3\]]'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsol te/_'di spo ba bgyid bzhin pa las dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang
[\[233b.4\]]byung la bcabs pas dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung la [#]bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas spo ba gsol nas/[ #]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung
[\[233b.5\]]ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas spo ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung nas bcabs pa de'i slad du gzhi nas spo ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang
[\[233b.6\]]dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pa de'i
[\[233b.7\]]slad du gzhi nas spo ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bas bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar
[\[234a.2\]]bgyi ba stsal te/_bdag mgu bar bgyi ba bgyid bzhin pa las dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung bas bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba gsol
[\[234a.3\]]na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[234a.4\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi
[\[234a.5\]]ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal te/_'di mgu bar bgyid bzhin pa las dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la dge slong
[\[234a.6\]]'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun
[\[234a.7\]]gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba [#]snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun [#]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la [#]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun

[\[235a.1\]]yang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung la bcabs pas [#]bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung nas bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas spo

[\[236b.1\]]'dra ba yang bldabs [#]te byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag [#]dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba'i ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bldabs

[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis

[\[237a.3\]]te/_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la [#]dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung ba de'i slad du gzhi nas mgu bar bgyi ba stsal te/_

[\[237a.5\]]gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bldabs [#]te byung ba de'i slad du yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bgyi ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka la dge
[\[237a.6\]]'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bldabs [#]te byung ba de'i slad du yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum
[\[237a.7\]]du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba bar ma dang 'dra ba yang bldabs [#]te byung ba'i slad du yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bgyi ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar [#]cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_bdag dge slong 'char ka dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun
[\[237b.2\]]las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong 'char ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal te/_bdag dge slong 'char kas [#]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i
[\[237b.3\]]slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis lags te/_dge 'dun las dbyung [#]ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka [#]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis lags
[\[237b.4\]]pa la dbyung ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun
[\[237b.5\]]lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal te/_dge slong 'char ka 'dis che ge mo las byung ba'i dge
[\[237b.6\]]'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis lags te dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka la [#]che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i
[\[237b.7\]]ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/'char ka khyod nyon cig_/khyod kyis legs par ma byas so/_/legs pa shin tu ma byas so/_/bya ba ma yin pa [#]gzhan byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i chos ni 'di ltar 'dod chags [#]dang bral bar bgyi ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston zhing /_zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar
[\[238a.2\]]bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston bzhin du khyod kyis mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu 'di byas pa mi rigs so/_/mi gti mug can khyod kyis sbrul nag po dug myur du khyab par byed pa dug drag po dug rno ba la lag pa gnyi gas bzung ba ni bla'i kun tu
[\[238a.3\]]chags pa'i sems kyis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa la gzung [#]ba ni de ltar ma yin no/_/mi gti mug can khyod lag pa gang dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams las dad pas sbyin pa blang bar bya ba'i lag pa de dag nyid kyis mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu 'di bya ba mi rigs so/_/mi
[\[238a.4\]]gti mug can khyod kyis de ltar bdag la bsnyen bkur bya ba nyams su blangs par [#]gyur to/_/'char ka gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sgron ma dang /_chos kyi snang ba dang /_chos kyi 'od dang /_chos kyi gsal ba dang /_chos kyi snang ba gsal ba dang /_chos kyi mar me dang /_chos kyi rab
[\[238a.5\]]gsal med par byed pa ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba mi rko/[ #]rgyun las bzlog pa la mi 'bad/_'bab chu dang 'khri shing mi skems/_bdud mi 'dul/_bdud kyi
[\[238a.6\]]rgyal mtshan mi snyol/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan mi sgreng /_sdig pa'i rgyun mi gcod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun par bskor ba'i rjes su mi bskor ba ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[238a.7\]]ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang gnyis kyi zag pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pa gang yin pa'o/_/'char
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]ka khyod kyis ltung ba 'di ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du
[\[238b.2\]]shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par
[\[238b.3\]]bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi 'os ma yin no/[ #]/bsam
[\[238b.4\]]gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[238b.5\]]min skye mched dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems kyi rnam grangs dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_
[\[238b.6\]]skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa'i 'os ma yin no/_/'char ka khyod [#]ltung ba 'di ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/_'gro ba gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig khyod kyis [#]'gro ba yin par shes par bya ste/_sems can dmyal ba'am dud 'gro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[238b.7\]]kyang las kyi mtha' 'chab pa'i 'gro ba ni gnyis te sems can dmyal ba'am dud 'gro'o/_/gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid mi ches pa de dag ni bcabs par sems so zhes gsungs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_dge slong 'char ka 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka 'di la che ge mo las byung
[\[239a.2\]]ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal te/_dge slong 'char ka 'dis che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis lags te dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
[\[239a.3\]]dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyis pa dbyung
[\[239a.4\]]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'chang ka la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun
[\[239a.5\]]lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba dbyung lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/'char ka khyod nyon cig_/'char ka khyod kyis legs par [#]byas so/_/legs pa shin tu yang [#]byas so/_/gnyis ni mkhas pa/_gnyis ni gsal
[\[239a.6\]]ba/_gnyis ni dge ba/_gnyis ni skyes bu dam pa ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir [#]'chos pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis ni sdig pa'i rtsa ba rko [#]ba/_rgyun las bzlog pa la 'bad pa/_'bab chu dang 'khri shing skems pa/_
[\[239a.7\]]bdud 'dul ba/_bdud kyi rgyal mtshan snyol ba/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_sdig pa'i rgyun gcod [#]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun par [#]bskor ba'i rjes su bskor ba ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa [#]gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis ni rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gnyis kyi zag pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_ltung ba mi 'byin pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[239b.2\]]ltung ba byung nas chos bzhin du phyir 'chos pa gang yin pa'o/_/'char ka khyod ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes
[\[239b.3\]]dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bsngos
[\[239b.4\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_
[\[239b.5\]]stong pa nyid du so sor rtog [#]pa'i 'du shes kyi 'os su gyur pa yin/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye
[\[239b.6\]]mched dang /[ #]ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_
[\[239b.7\]]sems kyi rnam grangs dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_zag pa zad [#]pa'i 'os su byung ba yin pa'o/_/'char ka ltung ba 'di bshags shing so sor bshags pas 'gro ba gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig khyod kyis [#]'gro ba yin par shes par bya ste/_lha'am mi'o/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las kyi mtha' mi 'chab [#]pa'i 'gro ba ni gnyis te/_lha'am mi'o/_/gang dag ngas bshad pa la yid ches pa de dag gis [#]'chab par mi sems so [#]zhes gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/[ #]bcabs pas [#]char ba bzhin du 'bab/_/bshags pa
[\[240a.2\]]char bzhin 'bab mi 'gyur/_/de lta bas na bshags par bya/_/de ltar [#]char bzhin de mi 'bab/_/ce'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod byung zin gyis bag yod par sgrubs [#]shig_/phyir bcos pa'i gzhi'o//_//bam[#] po dgu pa ste tha ma/_phyir bcos pa'i gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'i
[\[240a.3\]]sdom la/_'dre dang phyag bya ma yin dang /_/bslab pa sbyin pa tha ma'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa gre [#]skyes 'di dge slong ma rnams dang lhan [#]cig 'dre zhing gnas na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis [#]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_
[\[240a.4\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre [#]skyes dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gre [#]skyes 'di dge slong ma rnams dang lhan [#]cig 'dre zhing gnas te/_de'i slad
[\[240a.5\]]du dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams [#]dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa la/_de gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong gre [#]skyes dge slong ma rnams [#]dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad par bzod pa
[\[240a.6\]]de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams [#]dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas
[\[240a.7\]]pa la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol/_'phags pa dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pas [#]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa stsol na/_gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing
[\[240b.2\]]bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa stsal [#]to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun 'phags
[\[240b.3\]]ma [#]rnams gsan du gsol/_'phags pa [#]dge slong gre skyes dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes dge 'dun gyis
[\[240b.4\]]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma gang dag 'phags pa dge slong gre skyes dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa
[\[240b.5\]]stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis 'phags pa gre skyes dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las
[\[240b.6\]]mdzad lags pa la phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma [#]lags pa'i sdom pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_li ts+tsha bI [#]chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur na gal te dge 'dun gyi
[\[240b.7\]]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di li ts+tsha bI [#]chen po la lhung bzed khas [#]dbub pa [#]bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag li ts+tsha bI [#]chen po mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pas 'phags
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur bas dge 'dun gyis bdag la lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad de/[ #]bdag lhung bzed khas phub pa dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog par gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs
[\[241a.2\]]brtse ba'i slad du lhung bzed slar bzlog tu gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_li ts+tsha bI [#]chen po mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pa 'di/_tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur te/_dge 'dun gyis de la lhung bzed
[\[241a.3\]]khas dbub pa mdzad lags [#]pa las/_li ts+tsha bI chen pos [#]lhung bzed khas phub pa de'i [#]dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis li ts+tsha bI [#]chen po las [#]lhung bzed slar bzlog
[\[241a.4\]]pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong dga' byed kyis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang bcab pa'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang bcabs [#]par ma bgyis te/_bdag dge slong dga' byed
[\[241a.5\]]dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[241a.6\]]dge slong dga' byed 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa'i [#]'khrig pa'i chos bstan kyang bcab pa'i [#]sems gcig tsam gyis kyang bcabs [#]par ma bgyis te/_dge slong dga' byed 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/[ #]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus
[\[241a.7\]]la[#] bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dga' byed 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]par spyod pa [#]'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang bcab pa'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang bcabs [#]par ma bgyis pas dge slong dga' byed 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsol na/_
[\[241b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab_ pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
[\[241b.3\]]gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslabs [#]pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/phyir bcos pa'i gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'o//_//sa gzhan na gnas pa'i spyod pa dang yongs su spyod pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/_ngo
[\[241b.4\]]bo nyid brjod gtod dang len/_/gso sbyong dang ni dgag dbye'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'gro ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/_'greng ba yang mchid kyis [#]mi 'tshal/_
[\[241b.5\]]'dug pa yang mchid kyis [#]mi 'tshal/_nyal ba yang mchid kyis [#]mi 'tshal/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i [#]tshig gis de'i
[\[241b.6\]]ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa [#]stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'gro ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/_'greng ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/_'dug
[\[241b.7\]]pa yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/[ #]nyal ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la [#]dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du
[\[242a.2\]]bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'gro ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/_'greng ba yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/_'dug pa yang mchid kyis mi 'tshal/[ #]nyal ba yang mchid
[\[242a.3\]]kyis mi 'tshal ba la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par [#]stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i [#]ngo bo nyid [#]tshol du stsal ba/_skra 'greng bar gyur skra 'phyar bar gyur pa'i
[\[242a.4\]]dge[#] 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston [#]la mtshams kyi [#]nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de [#]las slar ldog na thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse
[\[242a.5\]]ba'i slad du bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan [#]du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba'i [#]skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun
[\[242a.6\]]la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing /_gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de slar ldog na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
[\[242a.7\]]mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing /_gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de [#]las slar ldog ste/_de'i slad du dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal
[\[242b.2\]]ba la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du
[\[242b.3\]]bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di
[\[242b.4\]]zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba byed bcabs pas/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol te/_
[\[242b.5\]]dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong [#]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal bas zhag 'di snyed cig ni bgyis lags/_bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig mchis [#]te/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[242b.6\]]kyis bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i
[\[242b.7\]]dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bas zhag 'di
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]snyed cig ni bgyis lags/_bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig mchis lags te/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag mgu bar bgyi ba spyod par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge
[\[243a.2\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar [#]bgyid pa/_'thab [#]mo bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/_de dag gis bdag la gzhi [#]'dis gleng bar 'gyur/_dran par bgyid par 'gyur
[\[243a.3\]]bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du spo ba slar gtang [#]bar bgyi'o/_/phyir rgol pa mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchi nas yang spo ba blang bar bgyi'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa
[\[243a.4\]]dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong spo ba bgyid pa'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/_bdag dge slong [#]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba spyod pa bag yangs su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do/_/yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pa [#]bdag ngo tsha ba [#]ma mchis par mi gzung
[\[243a.5\]]du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pas/_dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/[ #]mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/_'thab [#]mo bgyid pa/_'gyed par
[\[243a.6\]]bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/_de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/_dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar gtad par [#]bgyi'o/_/phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar
[\[243a.7\]]mchis na yang mgu bar bgyi ba [#]blang bar bgyi'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong mgu bar bgyi ba'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/_bdag dge
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do/_/yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pas bdag ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa
[\[243b.2\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/_'thab [#]mo bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod [#]par bgyid pa dag mchi zhes thos te/_de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/_
[\[243b.3\]]dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis de skad thos na dge slong rnams kyi mdun du spo ba slar gtang [#]ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag spo ba yang slar len to/_/spo ba zhag ma [#]'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag spo
[\[243b.4\]]ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pa'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas spo ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyis pa dgra bo dge slong de dag slar mchis
[\[243b.5\]]lags pas bdag spo ba yang slar len to/_/spo ba zhag ma [#]'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pas bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[243b.6\]]bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang [#]'bru bar bgyid pa/_'thab [#]mo bgyid pa/_'gyed par bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/_de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/_dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas/_bdag
[\[243b.7\]]gis de skad thos nas dge slong rnams kyi [#]mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar btang ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar len to/_/mgu bar bgyi ba zhag ma 'khor [#]ba rnams bgyi'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag mgu
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bar bgyid par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu ba bgyi ba'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mgu ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyis pa dgra bo
[\[244a.2\]]dge slong de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar len to/_/mgu bar bgyi ba zhag ma 'khor [#]ba rnams bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pas bdag mgu bar bgyid par gzung du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_thabs yin no/_/legs so/_/sa gzhan
[\[244a.3\]]na gnas pa'i spyod pa'i gzhi'o//_//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]'di ni glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/_'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba [#]nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi
[\[244a.4\]]gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa
[\[244a.5\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/_'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed de/_de'i slad du dge
[\[244a.6\]]'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po
[\[244a.7\]]ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/_'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi [#]gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
[\[244b.2\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/_'di dge
[\[244b.3\]]slong rnams kyis smra bar mi 'gyur ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi gnas [#]par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed do/_/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par
[\[244b.4\]]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag lags
[\[244b.5\]]te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi'o//_//las bye ba dang /_dge 'dun bye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/_bzod pa gsol dang mthun pa dang /_/gso sbyong gsol ba len 'jug pa'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[244b.6\]]bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong nang par snga zhig tu mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo'i lung la rnam par rtog rtog na 'di snyam du [#]bgyid de/_gang las bdag cag las 'thab pa dang /_mtshang [#]'bru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa byung pa'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste/_ltung ba byung ngam ma byung ba dang /_
[\[244b.7\]]gnas [#]nas phyung ngam ma phyung ba lags na/_bdag cag la ltung ba byung gi ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags/_gnas nas phyung [#]ba lags kyi gnas nas ma phyung [#]ba ma lags te/_gang gnas nas phyung ba ni chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las ma 'khrugs par [#]gzhag par mi 'os pa [#]bgyis so snyam
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bgyis nas/_bdag grong khyer yangs pa can gyi [#]dge slong dang sdums bgyi zhing mthun par bgyi'o snyam ste/_bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid na/[ #]'byung bar bskyod pa [#]mtshungs par nye bar
[\[245a.2\]]ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog par bgyid na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad
[\[245a.3\]]lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar par gyur cing dge 'dun la [#]spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung
[\[245a.4\]]bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la/[ #]mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog par bgyid na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
[\[245a.5\]]dang /_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de dag las slar ldog par bgyid/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang
[\[245a.6\]]dag kau shAm+bI pa'i [#]dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa [#]rnams gsan du gsol/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di [#]skra 'greng bar gyur/_skra 'phyar
[\[245a.7\]]par gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/_'byung bar bskyod/_mtshungs par nye bar ston la/_mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las [#]mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_
[\[245b.2\]]'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi nang [#]du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas dge 'dun gyis bdag la bzod
[\[245b.3\]]pa mdzad lags te/_bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang
[\[245b.4\]]bcas pa la mthun pa stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa/_gsol nas/_dge 'dun
[\[245b.5\]]gyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di mthun pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod
[\[245b.6\]]pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyis gan du mchis te
[\[245b.7\]]bzod pa gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad lags te/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di [#]mthun pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]pa 'di la mthun pa stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa
[\[246a.2\]]dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge
[\[246a.3\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis bdag la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bdag bzod
[\[246a.4\]]pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas [#]mthun pa gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal lags pas/_bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la [#]mthun pa'i gso sbyong
[\[246a.5\]]gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa la [#]mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[246a.6\]]kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis [#]gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas/_'di dge 'dun gyi [#]gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas
[\[246a.7\]]pa 'di/_dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal lags pas/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal [#]ba 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong
[\[246b.2\]]'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/_bzod pa gsol nas/_dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/_bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gan
[\[246b.3\]]du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/_dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal [#]lags pas/_kau shA m+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal pa 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong
[\[246b.4\]]'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la [#]mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di
[\[246b.5\]]ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/[ #]dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa la [#]mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
[\[246b.6\]]'dzin to/_/las bye ba'i gzhi'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/_bdag cag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'o ma 'thungs te/[ #]bdag cag gis btung bar mi
[\[246b.7\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/_bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong go ta ma ni gos dras pa gyon te/_bdag cag gis bsgo [#]bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud [#]zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/_bdag cag ni [#]grong du gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba yongs su ma spyad
[\[247a.2\]]par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_legs par 'dzin pa des dge slong gau ta ma las ring du gyis shig_/so sor gyis shig_/
[\[247a.3\]]tha dad du gyis shig_/rgyang srings [#]shig_/thag srings [#]shig_/logs shig tu 'dug cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/_bdag cag gis sha za [#]bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma
[\[247a.4\]]ni 'o ma 'thungs te/[ #]bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau [#]ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/_bdag cag [#]gis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gos dras pa gyon
[\[247a.5\]]te/_bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud [#]zos par [#]'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/_bdag cag ni grong du gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba
[\[247a.6\]]yongs su ma spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang [#]dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_legs par 'dzin pa des tshul shing long shig_/'khor lo bye ba'i
