[\[247a.7\]]gzhi'o//_//rtsod pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/_gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang /_/dge 'dun bsnyen [#]gsum gnas brtan dang /_/'drim dang dran dang ma smyos dang /_/khyed dang de dag bdag 'dun bshags/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
[\[247b.2\]]bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bgyi ste/_gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis [#]dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon gsum [#]gyis 'dul bas rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar
[\[247b.3\]]bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba [#]byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/_
[\[247b.4\]]tshe[#] dang ldan pa gang dag gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar
[\[247b.5\]]bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar [#]cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la
[\[247b.6\]]rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal bar bskos te/[ #]gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar
[\[247b.7\]]byed do/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/_tshe dang
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ldan pa gang dag gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
[\[248a.2\]]rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming
[\[248a.3\]]'di[#] zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal ba'i yang gsal bar bsko bar bgyi ste/_gsal ba'i yang
[\[248a.4\]]gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la rtsod [#]pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_/gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du
[\[248a.5\]]dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/
[\[248a.6\]]dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/
[\[248a.7\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bya [#]ba 'di dge 'dun gyi [#]rtsod pa sbed par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/_rtsod
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko na/_tshe dang
[\[248b.2\]]ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi
[\[248b.3\]]gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa 'di gnas che [#]ge mo zhes bgyi bar gang zag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_ming [#]ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/_rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul
[\[248b.4\]]na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/_dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma
[\[248b.5\]]thog ste/_de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dag bskos na dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba [#]de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/_gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis
[\[248b.6\]]bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/_gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul lo/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla ba gsum gyi mtha'i
[\[248b.7\]]tshun[#] chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa dag gsan du gsol/_rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar/_gang zag ga ge mo dang /_ming [#]ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du rtsod pa [#]byung nas yun
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]'di srid gcig [#]lags te/_rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na/_gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis dge 'dun la phul na dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/_
[\[249a.2\]]dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal [#]ba'i yang gsal ba dag bskos na dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las gsal ba rnams
[\[249a.3\]]kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/_gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du phul na/_
[\[249a.4\]]gnas brtan dang bcas/_so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_des kyang bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong [#]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/_mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa
[\[249a.5\]]dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams [#]la dbul lo/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gi mtha' tshun chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_gnas brtan gsan [#]du gsol/_rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar/_gang zag ga
[\[249a.6\]]ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_ming [#]ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/_rtsod pa 'di gzu bo [#]rnams la phul na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid [#]rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar
[\[249a.7\]]bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/_dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba [#]bskos na/_dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/_gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/_dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/_gnas brtan
[\[249b.2\]]dang [#]bcas/_so sor thar ba dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du phul na/_des kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/_des bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/_mdo sde 'dzin pa
[\[249b.3\]]dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la zla ba drug gi [#]mtha' tshun chad du phul na de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid [#]rngo ma thog [#]nas/_de dag gis bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la [#]stsal nas/_bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di
[\[249b.4\]]gnas brtan la 'bul [#]lo/_gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa 'di thug pa ma mchis pa tshun chad kyis rnam pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
[\[249b.5\]]ba 'di dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]tshul shing 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong tshul shing 'brim pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
[\[249b.6\]]tshul shing 'brim mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong [#]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag
[\[249b.7\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bsko bar mdzad [#]pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig[ #]/_gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bskos lags te/_
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' [#]mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob gsog brdzun gyis skur te/_bdag la dge slong dag gis gzhi 'dis
[\[250a.2\]]gleng[#] bas bdag dge slong gyad bu nor dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[250a.3\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob gsog brdzun gyis skur te/_'di la dge 'dun gyis [#]gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
[\[250a.4\]]bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol [#]to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob
[\[250a.5\]]gsog brdzun gyis skur te/_'di la dge slong dag gis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi [#]dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol [#]na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong gyad bu nor 'di
[\[250a.6\]]la dran pas 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gyad bu nor
[\[250a.7\]]la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir bas dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/_rjes su mthun
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pa ma lags pa/_rung ba ma lags pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyod [#]cing smras te stsal [#]nas mig 'gyur/[ #]kha chu zags/_bzhin bsgyur/_sa la 'gres ldogs/[ #]gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log pa ltar bcos/_ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/_smra bar ma bsams
[\[250b.2\]]kyang smras te/_bdag gis dran pa rnyed na bdag la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas bdag dge slong bye ma skyes dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba
[\[250b.3\]]stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma [#]lags pa/_rung ba ma lags pa/_tshul dang
[\[250b.4\]]mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad cing smras te stsal [#]nas mig 'gyur/[ #]kha chu zags/_bzhin bsgyur/_sa la 'gres ldogs/_gnyid [#]kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log pa ltar bcos/_ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/_smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/_'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge
[\[250b.5\]]slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong bye ma skyes 'di dge 'dun las ma smyos par [#]'dul ba gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol
[\[250b.6\]]ba'o/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa [#]sems 'khrugs pa/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/_rung ba ma lags pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa/_mang du spyad cing
[\[250b.7\]]smras te stsal [#]nas mig 'gyur/[ #]kha chu zags/_bzhin bsgyur/_sa la 'gres ldogs/_gnyid [#]kyis ma log [#]kyang gnyis kyis log [#]pa ltar bcos/_ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/_smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/_'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]slong bye ma skyes 'di dge 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas/_'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/
[\[251a.2\]]gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
[\[251a.3\]]to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur/_mtshang [#]'bru bar gyur/_rtsod par gyur/_'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/_phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed de/_rnyed pa
[\[251a.4\]]ma yin no/_/nyes pa rnyed kyi [#]legs par rnyed pa ni [#]ma yin no/_/kha na ma tho ba sbom po dang /_khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las khyod la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gi mdun du mthol ba dang /_
[\[251a.5\]]'chags pa dang /_mi 'chab par bdag spro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur/_mtshang [#]'bru bar gyur/_rtsod par gyur/_'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/_phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa
[\[251a.6\]]ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed de/_rnyed pa ma yin no/_/nyes pa rnyed kyis [#]legs pa ma rnyed de/[ #]kha na ma tho ba sbom po dang /_khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las khyed cag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag [#]la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa dag gi
[\[251a.7\]]mdun du bdag mthol lo/_/bshags [#]so/_/mi[#] 'chab bo/_/mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_ltung ba mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/phyin cad sdom mam/_sdom mo/_/lan gsum du bzlas/_
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rtsod pa'i gzhi'o//_//gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/_gnas khang zas la bsko ba gnyis/_/thug pa bag chos 'brim pa gnyis/_/phran tshegs 'brim par byed pa gnyis/[ #]/snod spyad [#]'brub pa dang gos kyi gnyis/_/dbyar gyi ras chen sped dang 'gyed/[ #]/mngag gzhug pa dang
[\[251b.2\]]mdzes chos [#]te/_/gang zag bcu dang gnyis po dag_/ston pas yang dag bshad pa yin/_/lag gi bla dang lag dpon dang /_/'khar ba dang ni dra ba'o/_/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyod dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge[#] 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
[\[251b.3\]]gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko bar spro bar [#]bgyi ste/_
[\[251b.4\]]dge slong ming [#]zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar [#]spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di
[\[251b.5\]]zhes bgyi ba'i 'di [#]gnas khang bsko bar [#]spro na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko bar bsko ba [#]bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di
[\[251b.6\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]gnas khang bsko bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas
[\[251b.7\]]la bsko bar spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro ste dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bskos na tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la
[\[252a.2\]]zas la bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas [#]de de bzhin du
[\[252a.3\]]'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
[\[252a.4\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge 'dun rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong
[\[252a.5\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
[\[252a.6\]]gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod
[\[252a.7\]]dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun [#]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_/dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba [#]'di dge slong
[\[252b.2\]]rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi
[\[252b.3\]]bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la phran tshegs
[\[252b.4\]]'brim par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming
[\[252b.5\]]'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim mo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la
[\[252b.6\]]phran tshegs 'brim par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa
[\[252b.7\]]de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi [#]dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[253a.2\]]bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad du [#]'drub bo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par spro ste/_dge slong ming
[\[253a.3\]]'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
[\[253a.4\]]nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[253a.5\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gyi [#]dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed
[\[253a.6\]]pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar [#]dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar [#]dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di
[\[253a.7\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[253b.2\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyis rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos
[\[253b.3\]]kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun [#]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro ste/_dge
[\[253b.4\]]slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/
[\[253b.5\]]dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par spro'am/_
[\[253b.6\]]spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming [#]'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
[\[253b.7\]]dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]chen sbed par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung [#]shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
[\[254a.2\]]shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming [#]'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[254a.3\]]btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged
[\[254a.4\]]par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
[\[254a.5\]]dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge
[\[254a.6\]]'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyod dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong
[\[254a.7\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'dun gyi mngag gzhug par [#]bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes
[\[254b.2\]]bgyi ba 'di mngag gzhug par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
[\[254b.3\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
[\[254b.4\]]cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi [#]mdzes 'chos su bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun
[\[254b.5\]]gyi mdzes 'chos su spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis
[\[254b.6\]]bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi [#]mdzes 'chos su bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/sder spyad 'brim pa dang /_gnas mal 'bogs [#]pa dang /_gnas mal byi bo 'bogs [#]pa dang /_shing tog 'brim pa dang /_
[\[254b.7\]]chu'i zhal ta ba dang /_bang rim gyi zhal ta ba dang /_sgye'u cung [#]srung ba dang /_sra brkyang sbed pa dag ni [#]las snga ma dag gi khongs [#]su 'dus so/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod lag gi blar spro'am/_spro'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar spro na/_gal
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko bar bgyid de/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lag gi blar bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
[\[255a.2\]]gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]lag gi blar spro ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko [#]bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de [#]dag ni gsungs shig_/
[\[255a.3\]]dge 'dun gyis [#]bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bskos [#]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/lag pod [#]ni lag gi bla'i khongs su 'dus so/_/gnas mal gyi gzhi'o//_//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[255a.4\]]bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam [#]chung la bro [#]'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de/_dge 'dun las 'khar ba [#]gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]rgas 'khogs shing
[\[255a.5\]]nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba [#]gnang ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal ba sbyor mi bzod pa 'di dge 'dun las 'khar ba gnang ba gsol
[\[255a.6\]]na/[# ]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba [#]gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
[\[255a.7\]]du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing [#]sbyor mi bzod de/_dge 'dun la [#]'khar ba gnang ba gsol na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod [#]la 'khar ba'i [#]gnang ba
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]gsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di [#]rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod [#]la 'khar ba gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun
[\[255b.2\]]gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la [#]bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar pa gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba rgas 'khogs
[\[255b.3\]]shing nyam chung ba [#]bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams [#]las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang
[\[255b.4\]]ba stsal du gsol/_lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa 'di dge 'dun las dra ba gnang ba [#]gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
[\[255b.5\]]mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing
[\[255b.6\]]sbyor mi bzod de/_dge 'dun las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/[ #]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba gsol [#]na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal
[\[255b.7\]]zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis [#]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/'khar ba [#]dang dra ba gnyis ka'i gnang ba sbyin pa ni las snga ma gnyis ka'i khongs su 'dus so/_/gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'o//_//las kyi grangs brgya [#]rtsa gcig tu nges par gang [#]las shes she na/_gtam gyi gzhi
[\[256a.2\]]las las kyi [#]grangs brjod pa la/_btsun pa las dag tu mchis/_nye ba [#]'khor brgya rtsa gcig go_/btsun pa las du dag gis las thams cad bsdus/_nye ba 'khor gsum gyis te/_gsum gang zhe na/_gsol ba'i las dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so/_/_btsun pa las
[\[256a.3\]]brgya rtsa gcig po gang dag lags pa de dag ni gsol ba'i las dag ni du/_gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dag ni du/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las dag ni du mchis bka' stsal pa nye ba [#]'khor/_gsol ba'i las ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las ni bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no/_/gsol ba dang bzhi'i
[\[256a.4\]]las ni sum cu'o zhes gsungs so/_/de las gsol ba'i las nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_gal te [#]gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams gsang ste dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams dge 'dun gyi nang du dri
[\[256a.5\]]ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_gso sbyong de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las bya ba dang /_gso sbyong gi tshe ltung ba de la dge 'dun thams cad
[\[256a.6\]]yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_gso sbyong gi tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_gso sbyong gi tshe ltung ba de ni gang yin pa de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa nyid ma
[\[256a.7\]]yin[#] par gyur na de'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dgag dbye [#]bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dgag dbye de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las bya ba dang /_dgag dbye'i tshe ltung ba de la dge 'dun thams cad yid
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gnyis dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi [#]las bya ba dang /_dgag dbye'i tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dgag dbye'i tshe ltung ba de ni gang yin de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa nyid ma yin
[\[256b.2\]]par gyur na de'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas par khas blang ba'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_shi ba'i rdzas dang /_shi ba'i nor dang 'dra pa'i gang zag byin gyis brlab [#]pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis
[\[256b.3\]]chos[#] gos sra brkyang de gding ba'i [#]dge slong la gtad pa dang /_gyad bu nor lta bu chos gos gsum ngan pa la dge 'dun gyis ras yug chen sbyin pa la gsol ba [#]'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma gang dag ji ltar skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de
[\[256b.4\]]lta [#]de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par byed pa [#]khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed du gzhug pa la gsol ba [#]'ba' zhig gi [#]las bya ba dang /_ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_gzhogs 'phyas byed ba'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las
[\[256b.5\]]bya ba dang /_bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs [#]su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_sbyin bdag longs spyod 'gribs pa'i khyim du zan mi bza' ba'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba 'ba'
[\[256b.6\]]zhig gi las bya ba dang /_khyim gyi sdom pa byin pa de nyid gzhig pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_khyim bdag dge slong la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba 'debs pa'i khyim du lhung bzed khas dbub [#]pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang /_lhung bzed khas phub pa de nyid bzod pa
[\[256b.7\]]gsol ba'i khyim du de nyid [#]bzlog par bya ba la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba'o/[ #]/gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bzhi bcu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/_gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par [#]bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor ba dang /_mtshams chen po gcad pa [#]dang /_mtshams
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bu chung bcad pa la [#]gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_mtshams chen po bcad pa'i nang du chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong smyos shing sems 'khrug [#]pa las kyi gnas su rad rod byed pa mi
[\[257a.2\]]mthun par mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun [#]la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyis las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas par khas len pa rnams la gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang
[\[257a.3\]]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_rung ba'i khang pa la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol
[\[257a.4\]]ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_lag gi bla dang lag pod bsko ba la gsol ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_gnas khang [#]bsko ba la gsol ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_zas la bsko bar bsko ba la gsol
[\[257a.5\]]ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_thug pa 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_bag chos 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_phran tshegs 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_snod spyad 'brim [#]pa bsko ba la gsol ba
[\[257a.6\]]dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed pa bsko [#]ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'gyed[#] pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed pa [#]bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_
[\[257a.7\]]dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'gyed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_mngag gzhug par [#]bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_mdzes 'chos bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba mngon sum gyis 'dul ba'i gzu
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bo bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba gzu bos zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun nam gzu bo rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'i gang zag gsal ba dang gsal ba'i yang gsal ba bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge 'dun la rtsod
[\[257b.2\]]pa byung ba gang zag gsal ba [#]dang gsal ba'i [#]yang gsal bas zhi bar ma nus te dge 'dun la phul ba na dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbed pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge 'dun [#]rtsod pa byung ba'i tshe tshul shing 'brim pa'i [#]gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi
[\[257b.3\]]las bya ba dang /_dge slong khang pa'i gzhi rung ba bstan par [#]gsol ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba bstan pa gsol ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong khyim sun 'byin pa la dge sbyong gi chos ma yin pa rnam pa mang pos gleng
[\[257b.4\]]ba'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_rgan po dang nad pa la chos gos [#]snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong lag gi bla la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba
[\[257b.5\]]dang /_lhung bzed 'brel pa med par 'brim pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma skye bo [#]phal po che ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de ltar khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma'i
[\[257b.6\]]ston pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_so sor bshags pa'i nyes pa spang pa'i phyir gang zag nags nyul ba bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong dge 'dun gyi [#]gnas nas phyung ba la dge slong mas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
[\[257b.7\]]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma 'khor skyong nus pa la 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma 'khor skyong nus pa dang lo bcu gnyis lon [#]pa la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang [#]ba sbyin pa la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dge slong rgan po dang nad pa la 'khar ba gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong rgan po dang na ba la dra ba gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_gtsug lag khang mtshams tha dad pa gnyis kyi rnyed pa gcig tu bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba
[\[258a.2\]]dang /_dge slong ma'i bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang [#]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba la [#]tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
[\[258a.3\]]gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma [#]mu ge'i sdug bsngal byung ba'i tshe nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'brel ba'i nye bar spyod pa'i [#]gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /_dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dge 'dun gyi tshad [#]la zhag bzhi bcu mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la
[\[258a.4\]]gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba'o/[ #]/gsol ba dang bzhi'i las sum cu gang zhe na/_dge slong dang dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_mu stegs can rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zla ba bzhi'i bar du mkhan pos sbyar pa'i gos kyi [#]gnas pa [#]sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
[\[258a.5\]]bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor ba dang /_mtshams chen po dang /_mtshams bu chung dgrol ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_gnas nas phyung ba bzod pa'i las byas pa mthun pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_mthun pa byin pa la [#]mthun pa'i gso sbyong sbyin pa la
[\[258a.6\]]gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_nan tur gyi las bsdigs pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_phyir 'gyed pa dang /_ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /_phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /[ #]gso sbyong
[\[258a.7\]]gzhag pa dang /_dgag dbye gzhag par bya ba dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_de dag la bzod pa bya ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_bya ba dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /[ #]spo ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /[ #]gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa la gsol
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba [#]la gsol
[\[258b.2\]]ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_sra brkyang dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_ma smyos pas 'dul pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa sbyin [#]la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge
[\[258b.3\]]'dun gyi dbyen byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_de'i [#]rjes su phyogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_khyim sun 'byin pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_bka' blo mi bde ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang
[\[258b.4\]]bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge slong dang dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong ma bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma dkon mchog gtong ba
[\[258b.5\]]bzlog [#]pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma 'thab krol byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma sde zhing gnas pa bzlog [#]pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge slong ma sde zhing gnas su 'dzud pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo
[\[258b.6\]]ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bsnyil ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang /_pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ba la bslab pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba'o/_/las rnams kyi bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di dag yin te/_gsang dang
[\[258b.7\]]nang du dri phyir dang /_gso sbyong de la ltung bcas dang /_/de la dge 'dun yid gnyis dang /_/rtsod dang nges nyid ma yin dang /_/de yi don du lnga po dag_/thams cad dgag dbyer gtogs pa yin/_/dbyar gnas khas blangs [#]nyid dang ni/_/shi ba'i rdzas dang nor 'dra dang /_/chos gos sra brkyang gtad pa dang /_/chos gos sbyin par
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bya ba dang /_/gnas ngan len ni brjod pa dang /_/grangs su gzhug pa bzhi dag dang /_/khyim gyi sdom dang de gzhig dang /_/lhung bzed khas dbub bya ba dang /_/de nyid bzlog par bya ba dag_/gsol ba 'ba' zhig las yin no/_/gnas dang mtshams ni gsum po dang /_/mi 'bral smyos dang dgag dbye dang /_/_
[\[259a.2\]]gnas mal stobs par byed pa dang /_/rung ba'i [#]sa gzhi bsgo ba dang /_/sra brkyang dang ni de 'ding dang /_/spong dang lag gi bla dang ni/_/gnas khang bsko la sogs pa dang /_/gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang /_/tshul shing 'brim par byed pa dang /_/khang pa khang chen bstan pa dang /_/gleng dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur dang /_/
[\[259a.3\]]stan [#]dang lhung bzed 'brim pa dang /_/ma dad go bar bya ba dang /_/ston pa dang ni nags nyul dang /_/phyag mi bya dang mang phyir dang /_/'khar ba dra ba'i phyir dang ni/_/rnyed pa gcig tu bya phyir dang /_/bslab pa sbyin dang nye [#]gnas dang /_/bu dang nye du'i phyir 'gro ba/_/gsol ba [#]gnyis kyi las yin no/_/bsnyen
[\[259a.4\]]par rdzogs par bya ba dang /_/mu stegs gnas dang mtshams dgrol dang /_/mthun sbyin gso sbyong bdun po dag_/brgya [#]dang dran dang ma smyos dang /_/de nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang /_/bsgo par bya ba rnams dang ni/_/nyams pa sbyin par bya ba dag_/gsol dang bzhi yi las
[\[259a.5\]]yin[#] no/_/las brgya rtsa gcig pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra pa'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po bram ze'i btsun pa slob dpon yon tan 'od bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa/_bde bar gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba bdud rtsi'i nying khus shes
[\[259a.6\]]rab kyi dbang po rgyas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dam pa nan tan snying por bsgrubs pa/[ #]sde pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi gtso bor [#]gyur pa/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba kun las btus pa rdzogs so//_//dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha
[\[259a.7\]]btsan po'i bka' lung gis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_'di la sh+lo ka [#]ni sum stong bdun brgya yod/_bam po ni dgur byas so//_//[#]
